atk-abh01a4:755_1: etaṁ adhivacanaṁ. Sā pariggahalakkhaṇā viramaṇarasā micchāvācappahānapaccupaṭṭhānā.
atk-abh01a4:755_2: Sundaro pasattho vā kammanto sammākammanto. Micchākammantasamucchedikāya pāṇātipātādiviratiyā
atk-abh01a4:755_3: etaṁ nāmaṁ. So samuṭṭhānalakkhaṇo viramaṇaraso micchākammantappahānapaccupaṭṭhāno.
atk-abh01a4:755_4: Sundaro pasattho vā ājīvo sammāājīvo. Micchājīvaviratiyā etaṁ adhivacanaṁ. So vodānalakkhaṇo
atk-abh01a4:756_0: Apica heṭṭhā viratittaye vuttavasenapettha lakkhaṇādīni veditabbāni. Iti imesaṁ tiṇṇaṁ
atk-abh01a4:756_1: dhammānaṁ vasena heṭṭhā vuttaṁ maggapañcakaṁ idha maggaṭṭhakaṁ veditabbaṁ. Yevāpanakesu
atk-abh01a4:756_2: ca imesaṁ abhāvo. Tathā karuṇāmuditānaṁ. Ime hi tayo dhammā idha pāḷiyaṁ āgatattāva
atk-abh01a4:756_3: yevāpanakesu na gahitā. Karuṇāmuditā pana sattārammaṇā, ime dhammā nibbānārammaṇāti
atk-abh01a4:756_4: tāpettha na gahitā. Ayaṁ tāva uddesavāre visesattho.
atk-abh01a4:757_0: 283. Niddesavāre pana maggaṅgaṁ maggapariyāpannanti ettha tāva maggassa aṅganti maggaṅgaṁ;
atk-abh01a4:757_1: maggakoṭṭhāsoti attho. Yathā pana araññe pariyāpannaṁ araññapariyāpannaṁ nāma hoti,
atk-abh01a4:757_2: evaṁ magge pariyāpannanti maggapariyāpannaṁ. Maggasannissitanti attho.
atk-abh01a4:758_0: 285.Pītisambojjhaṅgoti ettha pīti eva sambojjhaṅgoti pītisambojjhaṅgo. Tattha bodhiyā
atk-abh01a4:758_1: bodhissa vā aṅgoti bojjhaṅgo. Idaṁ vuttaṁ hoti – yā ayaṁ dhammasāmaggī yāya lokuttaramaggakkhaṇe
atk-abh01a4:758_4: dhammasāmaggiyā ariyasāvako bujjhatīti katvā bodhīti vuccati. Bujjhatīti kilesasantānaniddāya
atk-abh01a4:758_5: uṭṭhahati, cattāri vā ariyasaccāni paṭivijjhati, nibbānameva vā sacchikaroti. Tassā
atk-abh01a4:758_6: dhammasāmaggīsaṅkhātāya bodhiyā aṅgotipi bojjhaṅgo, jhānaṅgamaggaṅgādīni viya. Yopesa
atk-abh01a4:758_7: yathāvuttappakārāya etāya dhammasāmaggiyā bujjhatīti katvā ariyasāvako bodhīti vuccati,
atk-abh01a4:758_8: tassa bodhissa aṅgotipi bojjhaṅgo; senaṅgarathaṅgādayo viya. Tenāhu aṭṭhakathācariyā
atk-abh01a4:758_9: – ‘‘bujjhanakassa puggalassa aṅgāti vā bojjhaṅgā’’ti (vibha. aṭṭha. 466; saṁ. ni. aṭṭha. 3.5.182).
atk-abh01a4:759_0: Apica ‘‘bojjhaṅgāti kenaṭṭhena bojjhaṅgā? Bodhāya saṁvattantīti bojjhaṅgā, bujjhantīti
atk-abh01a4:759_1: bojjhaṅgā, anubujjhantīti bojjhaṅgā, paṭibujjhantīti bojjhaṅgā, sambujjhantīti bojjhaṅgā’’ti
atk-abh01a4:759_2: (paṭi. ma. 2.17) iminā paṭisambhidānayenāpi bojjhaṅgattho veditabbo. Pasattho sundaro
atk-abh01a4:759_3: vā bojjhaṅgoti sambojjhaṅgo. Evaṁ pīti eva sambojjhaṅgo pītisambojjhaṅgoti. Cittekaggatāniddesādīsupi
atk-abh01a4:760_0: 296.Tesaṁ dhammānanti ye tasmiṁ samaye paṭivedhaṁ gacchanti catusaccadhammā, tesaṁ
atk-abh01a4:760_1: dhammānaṁ. Anaññātānanti kiñcāpi paṭhamamaggena te dhammā ñātā nāma honti, yathā
atk-abh01a4:760_2: pana pakatiyā anāgatapubbaṁ vihāraṁ āgantvā vihāramajjhe ṭhitopi puggalo pakatiyā
atk-abh01a4:760_3: anāgatabhāvaṁ upādāya ‘anāgatapubbaṁ ṭhānaṁ āgatomhī’ti vadati, yathā ca pakatiyā
atk-abh01a4:760_4: apiḷandhapubbaṁ mālaṁ piḷandhitvā, anivatthapubbaṁ vatthaṁ nivāsetvā, abhuttapubbaṁ
atk-abh01a4:760_5: bhojanaṁ bhuñjitvā, pakatiyā abhuttabhāvaṁ upādāya abhuttapubbaṁ bhojanaṁ bhuttomhīti
atk-abh01a4:760_6: vadati, evamidhāpi yasmā pakatiyā iminā puggalena ime dhammā na ñātapubbā tasmā anaññātānanti
atk-abh01a4:760_7: vuttaṁ. Adiṭṭhādīsupi eseva nayo. Tattha adiṭṭhānanti ito pubbe paññācakkhunā adiṭṭhānaṁ.
atk-abh01a4:760_8: Appattānanti adhigamanavasena appattānaṁ. Aviditānanti ñāṇena apākaṭakatānaṁ. Asacchikatānanti
atk-abh01a4:760_9: apaccakkhakatānaṁ. Sacchikiriyāyāti paccakkhakaraṇatthaṁ. Yathā ca iminā padena,
atk-abh01a4:760_10: evaṁ sesehipi saddhiṁ anaññātānaṁ ñāṇāya, adiṭṭhānaṁ dassanāya, appattānaṁ pattiyā,
atk-abh01a4:761_0: 299.Catūhi vacīduccaritehītiādīsu vacīti vacīviññatti veditabbā. Tiṇṇaṁ dosānaṁ yena
atk-abh01a4:761_1: kenaci duṭṭhāni caritānīti duccaritāni. Vacīto pavattāni duccaritāni vacīduccaritāni,
atk-abh01a4:761_2: vaciyā vā nipphāditāni duccaritāni vacīduccaritāni. Tehi vacīduccaritehi. Ārakā ramatīti
atk-abh01a4:761_3: ārati. Vinā tehi ramatīti virati. Tato tato paṭinivattāva hutvā tehi vinā ramatīti
atk-abh01a4:761_4: paṭivirati. Upasaggavasena vā padaṁ vaḍḍhitaṁ. Sabbamidaṁ oramaṇabhāvassevādhivacanaṁ.
atk-abh01a4:761_5: Veraṁ maṇati, vināsetīti veramaṇī. Idampi oramaṇasseva vevacanaṁ. Yāya pana cetanāya
atk-abh01a4:761_6: musāvādādīni bhāsamāno karoti nāma, ayaṁ lokuttaramaggavirati. Uppajjitvā taṁ kiriyaṁ
atk-abh01a4:761_7: kātuṁ na deti, kiriyāpathaṁ pacchindatīti akiriyā. Tathā taṁ karaṇaṁ kātuṁ na deti,
atk-abh01a4:761_8: karaṇapathaṁ pacchindatīti akaraṇaṁ. Yāya ca cetanāya catubbidhaṁ vacīduccaritaṁ
atk-abh01a4:761_9: bhāsamāno ajjhāpajjati nāma, ayaṁ uppajjitvā tathā ajjhāpajjituṁ na detīti anajjhāpatti.
atk-abh01a4:762_0: Velāanatikkamoti ettha ‘‘tāya velāyā’’tiādīsu (dī. ni. 2.154; mahāva. 1-3; udā. 1
atk-abh01a4:762_1: ādayo) tāva kālo velāti āgato. ‘‘Uruvelāyaṁ viharatī’’ti (mahāva. 1; saṁ. ni. 1.137)
atk-abh01a4:762_2: ettha rāsi. ‘‘Ṭhitadhammo velaṁ nātivattatī’’ti (cūḷava. 384; a. ni. 8.19; udā. 45)
atk-abh01a4:762_3: ettha sīmā. Idhāpi sīmāva. Anatikkamanīyaṭṭhena hi cattāri vacīsucaritāni velāti
atk-abh01a4:762_4: adhippetāni. Iti yāya cetanāya cattāri vacīduccaritāni bhāsamāno velaṁ atikkamati
atk-abh01a4:762_5: nāma, ayaṁ uppajjitvā taṁ velaṁ atikkamituṁ na detīti velāanatikkamoti vuttā. Velāyatīti
atk-abh01a4:762_6: vā velā, calayati viddhaṁsetīti attho. Kiṁ velāyati? Catubbidhaṁ vacīduccaritaṁ.
atk-abh01a4:762_7: Iti velāyanato ‘velā’. Purisassa pana hitasukhaṁ anatikkamitvā vattatīti ‘anatikkamo’.
atk-abh01a4:763_0: Setuṁ hanatīti setughāto; catunnaṁ vacīduccaritānaṁ padaghāto paccayaghātoti attho.
atk-abh01a4:763_1: Paccayo hi idha setūti adhippeto. Tatrāyaṁ vacanattho – rāgādiko catunnaṁ vacīduccaritānaṁ
atk-abh01a4:763_2: paccayo vaṭṭasmiṁ puggalaṁ sinoti bandhatīti setu. Setussa ghāto setughāto. Vacīduccaritapaccayasamugghāṭikāya
atk-abh01a4:763_3: viratiyā etaṁ adhivacanaṁ. Ayaṁ pana sammāvācāsaṅkhātā virati pubbabhāge nānācittesu
atk-abh01a4:763_4: labbhati. Aññeneva hi cittena musāvādā viramati, aññena pesuññādīhi. Lokuttaramaggakkhaṇe
atk-abh01a4:763_5: pana ekacittasmiṁyeva labbhati. Catubbidhāya hi vacīduccaritacetanāya padapacchedaṁ
atk-abh01a4:763_6: kurumānā maggaṅgaṁ pūrayamānā ekāva virati uppajjati.
atk-abh01a4:764_0: 300.Kāyaduccaritehīti kāyato pavattehi kāyena vā nipphāditehi pāṇātipātādīhi duccaritehi.
atk-abh01a4:764_1: Sesaṁ purimanayeneva veditabbaṁ. Ayampi sammākammantasaṅkhātā virati pubbabhāge nānācittesu
atk-abh01a4:764_2: labbhati. Aññeneva hi cittena pāṇātipātā viramati, aññena adinnādānamicchācārehi.
atk-abh01a4:764_3: Lokuttaramaggakkhaṇe pana ekacittasmiṁyeva labbhati. Tividhāya hi kāyaduccaritacetanāya
atk-abh01a4:764_4: padapacchedaṁ kurumānā maggaṅgaṁ pūrayamānā ekāva virati uppajjati.
atk-abh01a4:765_0: 301. Sammāājīvaniddese akiriyātiādīsu yāya cetanāya micchājīvaṁ ājīvamāno kiriyaṁ
atk-abh01a4:765_1: karoti nāma, ayaṁ uppajjitvā taṁ kiriyaṁ kātuṁ na detīti akiriyāti. Iminā nayena
atk-abh01a4:765_2: yojanā veditabbā. Ājīvo ca nāmesa pāṭiyekko natthi, vācākammantesu gahitesu gahitova
atk-abh01a4:765_3: hoti, tappakkhikattā. Dhuvapaṭisevanavasena panāyaṁ tato nīharitvā dassitoti. Evaṁ
atk-abh01a4:765_4: sante sammāājīvo sakiccako na hoti , aṭṭha maggaṅgāni na paripūrenti, tasmā sammāājīvo
atk-abh01a4:765_5: sakiccako kātabbo, aṭṭha maggaṅgāni paripūretabbānīti. Tatrāyaṁ nayo – ājīvo nāma
atk-abh01a4:765_6: bhijjamāno kāyavacīdvāresuyeva bhijjati. Manodvāre ājīvabhedo nāma natthi. Pūrayamānopi
atk-abh01a4:765_7: tasmiṁyeva dvāradvaye pūrati. Manodvāre ājīvapūraṇaṁ nāma natthi. Kāyadvāre pana
atk-abh01a4:765_8: vītikkamo ājīvahetukopi atthi naājīvahetukopi. Tathā vacīdvāre.
atk-abh01a4:766_0: Tattha yaṁ rājarājamahāmattā khiḍḍāpasutā sūrabhāvaṁ dassentā migavadhaṁ vā panthaduhanaṁ
atk-abh01a4:766_1: vā paradāravītikkamaṁ vā karonti, idaṁ akusalaṁ kāyakammaṁ nāma. Tato viratipi ‘sammākammanto’
atk-abh01a4:766_2: nāma. Yaṁ pana naājīvahetukaṁ catubbidhaṁ vacīduccaritaṁ bhāsanti, idaṁ akusalaṁ
atk-abh01a4:767_0: Yaṁ pana ājīvahetu nesādamacchabandhādayo pāṇaṁ hananti, adinnaṁ ādiyanti, micchācāraṁ
atk-abh01a4:767_1: caranti, ayaṁ micchājīvo nāma. Tato virati ‘sammāājīvo’ nāma. Yampi lañjaṁ gahetvā
atk-abh01a4:767_2: musā bhaṇanti, pesuññapharusasamphappalāpe pavattenti, ayampi micchājīvo nāma. Tato
atk-abh01a4:768_0: Mahāsīvatthero panāha – ‘kāyavacīdvāresupi vītikkamo ājīvahetuko vā hotu no vā ājīvahetuko,
atk-abh01a4:768_1: akusalaṁ kāyakammaṁ vacīkammantveva saṅkhyaṁ gacchati. Tato viratipi sammākammanto
atk-abh01a4:768_2: sammāvācātveva vuccatī’ti. ‘Ājīvo kuhi’nti vutte pana ‘tīṇi kuhanavatthūni nissāya
atk-abh01a4:768_3: cattāro paccaye uppādetvā tesaṁ paribhogo’ti āha. Ayaṁ pana koṭippatto micchājīvo.
atk-abh01a4:769_0: Ayampi sammāājīvo pubbabhāge nānācittesu labbhati, aññeneva hi cittena kāyadvāravītikkamā
atk-abh01a4:769_1: viramati, aññena vacīdvāravītikkamā. Lokuttaramaggakkhaṇe pana ekacittasmiṁyeva labbhati.
atk-abh01a4:769_2: Kāyavacīdvāresu hi sattakammapathavasena uppannāya micchājīvasaṅkhātāya dussīlyacetanāya
atk-abh01a4:769_3: padapacchedaṁ kurumānā maggaṅgaṁ pūrayamānā ekāva virati uppajjatīti. Ayaṁ niddesavāre viseso.
atk-abh01a4:770_0: Yaṁ panetaṁ indriyesu anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṁ vaḍḍhitaṁ, maggaṅgesu ca sammāvācādīni,
atk-abh01a4:770_1: tesaṁ vasena saṅgahavāre ‘‘navindriyāni, aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo’’ti vuttaṁ. Suññatavāro
atk-abh01a4:771_0: 343. Ito paraṁ suddhikasuññatā suññatapaṭipadā suddhikaappaṇihitā appaṇihitapaṭipadāti
atk-abh01a4:771_1: ayaṁ desanābhedo hoti. Tattha suññatanti lokuttaramaggassa nāmaṁ. So hi āgamanato
atk-abh01a4:771_2: saguṇato ārammaṇatoti tīhi kāraṇehi nāmaṁ labhati. Kathaṁ? Idha bhikkhu anattato
atk-abh01a4:771_3: abhinivisitvā anattato saṅkhāre passati. Yasmā pana anattato diṭṭhamatteneva maggavuṭṭhānaṁ
atk-abh01a4:771_4: nāma na hoti, aniccatopi dukkhatopi daṭṭhumeva vaṭṭati, tasmā ‘aniccaṁ dukkhamanattā’ti
atk-abh01a4:771_5: tividhaṁ anupassanaṁ āropetvā sammasanto carati. Vuṭṭhānagāminivipassanā panassa
atk-abh01a4:771_6: tebhūmakepi saṅkhāre suññatova passati. Ayaṁ vipassanā suññatā nāma hoti. Sā āgamanīyaṭṭhāne
atk-abh01a4:771_7: ṭhatvā attano maggassa ‘suññata’nti nāmaṁ deti. Evaṁ maggo ‘āgamanato’ suññatanāmaṁ
atk-abh01a4:771_8: labhati. Yasmā pana so rāgādīhi suñño tasmā ‘saguṇeneva’ suññatanāmaṁ labhati. Nibbānampi
atk-abh01a4:771_9: rāgādīhi suññattā suññatanti vuccati. Taṁ ārammaṇaṁ katvā uppannattā maggo ‘ārammaṇato’
atk-abh01a4:772_0: Tattha suttantikapariyāyena saguṇatopi ārammaṇatopi nāmaṁ labhati. Pariyāyadesanā
atk-abh01a4:772_1: hesā. Abhidhammakathā pana nippariyāyadesanā. Tasmā idha saguṇato vā ārammaṇato vā
atk-abh01a4:772_2: nāmaṁ na labhati, āgamanatova labhati. Āgamanameva hi dhuraṁ. Taṁ duvidhaṁ hoti –
atk-abh01a4:772_3: vipassanāgamanaṁ maggāgamananti. Tattha maggassa āgataṭṭhāne vipassanāgamanaṁ dhuraṁ,
atk-abh01a4:772_4: phalassa āgataṭṭhāne maggāgamanaṁ dhuraṁ. Idha maggassa āgatattā vipassanāgamanameva dhuraṁ jātaṁ.
atk-abh01a4:773_0: 350.Appaṇihitanti, etthāpi appaṇihitanti maggasseva nāmaṁ. Idampi nāmaṁ maggo tīheva
atk-abh01a4:773_1: kāraṇehi labhati. Kathaṁ? Idha bhikkhu āditova dukkhato abhinivisitvā dukkhatova
atk-abh01a4:773_2: saṅkhāre passati. Yasmā pana dukkhato diṭṭhamatteneva maggavuṭṭhānaṁ nāma na hoti,
atk-abh01a4:773_3: aniccatopi anattatopi daṭṭhumeva vaṭṭati, tasmā aniccaṁ dukkhamanattā’ti tividhaṁ
atk-abh01a4:773_4: anupassanaṁ āropetvā sammasanto carati. Vuṭṭhānagāminivipassanā panassa tebhūmakasaṅkhāresu
atk-abh01a4:773_5: paṇidhiṁ sosetvā pariyādiyitvā vissajjeti. Ayaṁ vipassanā appaṇihitā nāma hoti. Sā
atk-abh01a4:773_6: āgamanīyaṭṭhāne ṭhatvā attano maggassa ‘appaṇihita’nti nāmaṁ deti. Evaṁ maggo ‘āgamanato’
atk-abh01a4:773_7: appaṇihitanāmaṁ labhati. Yasmā pana tattha rāgadosamohapaṇidhayo natthi, tasmā ‘saguṇeneva’
atk-abh01a4:773_8: appaṇihitanāmaṁ labhati. Nibbānampi tesaṁ paṇidhīnaṁ abhāvā appaṇihitanti vuccati.
atk-abh01a4:773_9: Taṁ ārammaṇaṁ katvā uppannattā maggo appaṇihitanāmaṁ labhati.
atk-abh01a4:774_0: Tattha suttantikapariyāyena saguṇatopi ārammaṇatopi nāmaṁ labhati. Pariyāyadesanā
atk-abh01a4:774_1: hesā . Abhidhammakathā pana nippariyāyadesanā. Tasmā idha saguṇato vā ārammaṇato
atk-abh01a4:774_2: vā nāmaṁ na labhati, āgamanatova labhati. Āgamanameva hi dhuraṁ. Taṁ duvidhaṁ hoti
atk-abh01a4:774_3: – vipassanāgamanaṁ maggāgamananti. Tattha maggassa āgataṭṭhāne vipassanāgamanaṁ dhuraṁ,
atk-abh01a4:774_4: phalassa āgataṭṭhāne maggāgamanaṁ dhuraṁ. Idha maggassa āgatattā vipassanāgamanameva dhuraṁ jātaṁ.
atk-abh01a4:775_0: Nanu ca suññato animitto appaṇihitoti tīṇi maggassa nāmāni? Yathāha – ‘‘tayome, bhikkhave,
atk-abh01a4:775_1: vimokkhā – suññato vimokkho, animitto vimokkho, appaṇihito vimokkho’’ti (paṭi. ma.
atk-abh01a4:775_2: 1.209). Tesu idha dve magge gahetvā animitto kasmā na gahitoti? Āgamanābhāvato. Animittavipassanā
atk-abh01a4:775_3: hi sayaṁ āgamanīyaṭṭhāne ṭhatvā attano maggassa nāmaṁ dātuṁ na sakkoti. Sammāsambuddho
atk-abh01a4:778_0: Animittavipassanaṁ kathesi. Vipassanā hi niccanimittaṁ dhuvanimittaṁ sukhanimittaṁ
atk-abh01a4:778_1: attanimittañca ugghāṭeti. Tasmā animittāti kathitā. Sā ca kiñcāpi taṁ nimittaṁ ugghāṭeti,
atk-abh01a4:778_2: sayaṁ pana nimittadhammesu caratīti sanimittāva hoti. Tasmā sayaṁ āgamanīyaṭṭhāne
atk-abh01a4:778_3: ṭhatvā attano maggassa nāmaṁ dātuṁ na sakkoti.
atk-abh01a4:779_0: Aparo nayo – abhidhammo nāma paramatthadesanā. Animittamaggassa ca paramatthato hetuvekallameva
atk-abh01a4:779_1: hoti. Kathaṁ? Aniccānupassanāya hi vasena animittavimokkho kathito. Tena ca vimokkhena
atk-abh01a4:779_2: saddhindriyaṁ adhimattaṁ hoti. Taṁ ariyamagge ekaṅgampi na hoti, amaggaṅgattā attano
atk-abh01a4:779_3: maggassa paramatthato nāmaṁ dātuṁ na sakkoti. Itaresu pana dvīsu anattānupassanāya
atk-abh01a4:779_4: tāva vasena suññatavimokkho, dukkhānupassanāya vasena appaṇihitavimokkho kathito.
atk-abh01a4:779_5: Tesu suññatavimokkhena paññindriyaṁ adhimattaṁ hoti, appaṇihitavimokkhena samādhindriyaṁ.
atk-abh01a4:779_6: Tāni ariyamaggassa aṅgattā attano maggassa paramatthato nāmaṁ dātuṁ sakkonti. Maggārammaṇattikepi
atk-abh01a4:779_7: hi maggādhipatidhammavibhajane chandacittānaṁ adhipatikāle tesaṁ dhammānaṁ amaggaṅgattāva
atk-abh01a4:779_8: maggādhipatibhāvo na vutto. Evaṁsampadamidaṁ veditabbanti. Ayamettha aṭṭhakathāmuttako
atk-abh01a4:780_0: Evaṁ sabbathāpi animittavipassanā sayaṁ āgamanīyaṭṭhāne ṭhatvā attano maggassa nāmaṁ
atk-abh01a4:780_1: dātuṁ na sakkotīti animittamaggo na gahito. Keci pana ‘animittamaggo āgamanato nāmaṁ
atk-abh01a4:780_2: alabhantopi suttantapariyāyena saguṇato ca ārammaṇato ca nāmaṁ labhatī’ti āhaṁsu.
atk-abh01a4:780_3: Te idaṁ vatvā paṭikkhittā – animittamagge saguṇato ca ārammaṇato ca nāmaṁ labhante
atk-abh01a4:780_4: suññataappaṇihitamaggāpi saguṇatoyeva ārammaṇatoyeva ca idha nāmaṁ labheyyuṁ. Na
atk-abh01a4:780_5: pana labhanti. Kiṁ kāraṇā? Ayañhi maggo nāma dvīhi kāraṇehi nāmaṁ labhati – sarasato
atk-abh01a4:780_6: ca paccanīkato ca; sabhāvato ca paṭipakkhato cāti attho. Tattha suññataappaṇihitamaggā
atk-abh01a4:780_7: sarasatopi paccanīkatopi nāmaṁ labhanti. Suññataappaṇihitamaggā hi rāgādīhi suññā,
atk-abh01a4:780_8: rāgapaṇidhiādīhi ca appaṇihitāti evaṁ ‘sarasato’ nāmaṁ labhanti. Suññato ca attābhinivesassa
atk-abh01a4:780_9: paṭipakkho, appaṇihito paṇidhissāti evaṁ ‘paccanīkato’ nāmaṁ labhanti. Animittamaggo
atk-abh01a4:780_10: pana rāgādinimittānaṁ niccanimittādīnañca abhāvena sarasatova nāmaṁ labhati, no paccanīkato.
atk-abh01a4:780_11: Na hi so saṅkhāranimittārammaṇāya aniccānupassanāya paṭipakkho. Aniccānupassanā panassa
atk-abh01a4:780_12: anulomabhāve ṭhitāti. Sabbathāpi abhidhammapariyāyena animittamaggo nāma natthīti.
atk-abh01a4:781_0: Suttantikapariyāyena panesa evaṁ āharitvā dīpito – yasmiñhi vāre maggavuṭṭhānaṁ hoti,
atk-abh01a4:781_1: tīṇi lakkhaṇāni ekāvajjanena viya āpāthamāgacchanti, tiṇṇañca ekato āpāthagamanaṁ
atk-abh01a4:781_2: nāma natthi. Kammaṭṭhānassa pana vibhūtabhāvadīpanatthaṁ evaṁ vuttaṁ. Ādito hi yattha
atk-abh01a4:781_3: katthaci abhiniveso hotu, vuṭṭhānagāminī pana vipassanā yaṁ yaṁ sammasitvā vuṭṭhāti
atk-abh01a4:781_4: tassa tasseva vasena āgamanīyaṭṭhāne ṭhatvā attano maggassa nāmaṁ deti. Kathaṁ? Aniccādīsu
atk-abh01a4:781_5: hi yattha katthaci abhinivisitvā itarampi lakkhaṇadvayaṁ daṭṭhuṁ vaṭṭati eva. Ekalakkhaṇadassanamatteneva
atk-abh01a4:781_6: hi maggavuṭṭhānaṁ nāma na hoti, tasmā aniccato abhiniviṭṭho bhikkhu na kevalaṁ aniccatova
atk-abh01a4:781_7: vuṭṭhāti, dukkhatopi anattatopi vuṭṭhātiyeva. Dukkhato anattato abhiniviṭṭhepi eseva
atk-abh01a4:781_8: nayo. Iti ādito yattha katthaci abhiniveso hotu, vuṭṭhānagāminī pana vipassanā yaṁ
atk-abh01a4:781_9: yaṁ sammasitvā vuṭṭhāti tassa tasseva vasena āgamanīyaṭṭhāne ṭhatvā attano maggassa
atk-abh01a4:781_10: nāmaṁ deti. Tattha aniccato vuṭṭhahantassa maggo animitto nāma hoti, dukkhato vuṭṭhahantassa
atk-abh01a4:781_11: appaṇihito, anattato vuṭṭhahantassa suññatoti. Evaṁ suttantapariyāyena āharitvā dīpito.
atk-abh01a4:782_0: Vuṭṭhānagāminī pana vipassanā kimārammaṇāti? Lakkhaṇārammaṇāti. Lakkhaṇaṁ nāma paññattigatikaṁ
atk-abh01a4:782_1: na vattabbadhammabhūtaṁ. Yo pana aniccaṁ dukkhamanattāti tīṇi lakkhaṇāni sallakkheti,
atk-abh01a4:782_2: tassa pañcakkhandhā kaṇṭhe baddhakuṇapaṁ viya honti. Saṅkhārārammaṇameva ñāṇaṁ saṅkhārato
atk-abh01a4:782_3: vuṭṭhāti. Yathā hi eko bhikkhu pattaṁ kiṇitukāmo pattavāṇijena pattaṁ ābhataṁ disvā
atk-abh01a4:782_4: haṭṭhapahaṭṭho gaṇhissāmīti cintetvā vīmaṁsamāno tīṇi chiddāni passeyya, so na chiddesu
atk-abh01a4:782_5: nirālayo hoti, patte pana nirālayo hoti; evameva tīṇi lakkhaṇāni sallakkhetvā saṅkhāresu
atk-abh01a4:782_6: nirālayo hoti. Saṅkhārārammaṇeneva ñāṇena saṅkhārato vuṭṭhātīti veditabbaṁ. Dussopamāyapi eseva nayo.
atk-abh01a4:783_0: Iti bhagavā lokuttaraṁ jhānaṁ bhājento suddhikapaṭipadāya catukkanayaṁ pañcakanayanti
atk-abh01a4:783_1: dvepi naye āhari. Tathā suddhikasuññatāya suññatapaṭipadāya suddhikaappaṇihitāya
atk-abh01a4:783_2: appaṇihitapaṭipadāyāti. Kasmā evaṁ āharīti? Puggalajjhāsayena ceva desanāvilāsena
atk-abh01a4:783_3: ca. Tadubhayampi heṭṭhā vuttanayeneva veditabbaṁ. Evaṁ lokuttaraṁ jhānaṁ bhāvetīti
atk-abh01a4:783_4: ettha suddhikapaṭipadāya catukkapañcakavasena dve nayā, tathā sesesūti sabbesupi
atk-abh01a4:788_0: Lokuttaramaggo hi ajjhattaṁ abhinivisitvā ajjhattaṁ vuṭṭhāti , ajjhattaṁ abhinivisitvā
atk-abh01a4:788_1: bahiddhā vuṭṭhāti, bahiddhā abhinivisitvā bahiddhā vuṭṭhāti, bahiddhā abhinivisitvā
atk-abh01a4:788_2: ajjhattaṁ vuṭṭhāti. Rūpe abhinivisitvā rūpā vuṭṭhāti, rūpe abhinivisitvā arūpā vuṭṭhāti.
atk-abh01a4:788_3: Arūpe abhinivisitvā arūpā vuṭṭhāti, arūpe abhinivisitvā rūpā vuṭṭhāti, ekappahāreneva
atk-abh01a4:789_0: ‘Sattaṭṭhaṅgapariṇāma’nti so panesa maggo aṭṭhaṅgikopi hoti sattaṅgikopi. Bojjhaṅgāpi
atk-abh01a4:789_1: satta vā honti cha vā. Jhānaṁ pana pañcaṅgikaṁ vā hoti caturaṅgikaṁ vā; tivaṅgikaṁ
atk-abh01a4:789_2: vā duvaṅgikaṁ vā. Evaṁ sattaaṭṭhādīnaṁ aṅgānaṁ pariṇāmo veditabboti attho.
atk-abh01a4:790: ‘Nimittaṁ paṭipadāpatī’ti nimittanti yato vuṭṭhānaṁ hoti; ‘paṭipadāpatī’ti paṭipadāya ca adhipatino ca calanācalanaṁ veditabbaṁ.
atk-abh01a4:791_0: Tattha ajjhattaṁ abhinivisitvā ajjhattaṁ vuṭṭhātītiādīsu tāva idhekacco āditova ajjhattaṁ
atk-abh01a4:791_1: pañcasu khandhesu abhinivisati, abhinivisitvā te aniccādito passati, yasmā pana na
atk-abh01a4:791_2: suddhaajjhattadassanamatteneva maggavuṭṭhānaṁ hoti, bahiddhāpi daṭṭhabbameva, tasmā
atk-abh01a4:791_3: parassa khandhepi anupādinnasaṅkhārepi aniccaṁ dukkhamanattāti passati. So kālena
atk-abh01a4:791_4: ajjhattaṁ sammasati kālena bahiddhāti. Tassevaṁ sammasato ajjhattaṁ sammasanakāle
atk-abh01a4:791_5: vipassanā maggena saddhiṁ ghaṭiyati. Evaṁ ajjhattaṁ abhinivisitvā ajjhattaṁ vuṭṭhāti
atk-abh01a4:791_6: nāma. Sace panassa bahiddhā sammasanakāle vipassanā maggena saddhiṁ ghaṭiyati, evaṁ
atk-abh01a4:791_7: ajjhattaṁ abhinivisitvā bahiddhā vuṭṭhāti nāma. Eseva nayo bahiddhā abhinivisitvā
atk-abh01a4:792_0: Aparo āditova rūpe abhinivisati abhinivisitvā bhūtarūpañca upādārūpañca paricchinditvā
atk-abh01a4:792_1: aniccādito passati, yasmā pana na suddharūpadassanamatteneva vuṭṭhānaṁ hoti arūpampi
atk-abh01a4:792_2: daṭṭhabbameva, tasmā taṁ rūpaṁ ārammaṇaṁ katvā uppannaṁ vedanaṁ saññaṁ saṅkhāre viññāṇañca
atk-abh01a4:792_3: idaṁ arūpanti paricchinditvā aniccādito passati. So kālena rūpaṁ sammasati kālena
atk-abh01a4:792_4: arūpaṁ. Tassevaṁ sammasato rūpasammasanakāle vipassanā maggena saddhiṁ ghaṭiyati.
atk-abh01a4:792_5: Evaṁ rūpe abhinivisitvā rūpā vuṭṭhāti nāma. Sace panassa arūpasammasanakāle vipassanā
atk-abh01a4:792_6: maggena saddhiṁ ghaṭiyati, evaṁ rūpe abhinivisitvā arūpā vuṭṭhāti nāma. Esa nayo
atk-abh01a4:792_7: arūpe abhinivisitvā arūpā ca rūpā ca vuṭṭhānepi.
atk-abh01a4:793_0: ‘‘Yaṁkiñci samudayadhammaṁ sabbaṁ taṁ nirodhadhamma’’nti (mahāva. 16; dī. ni. 1.298)
atk-abh01a4:793_1: evaṁ abhinivisitvā evameva vuṭṭhānakāle pana ekappahārena pañcahi khandhehi vuṭṭhāti
atk-abh01a4:793_2: nāmāti. Ayaṁ tikkhavipassakassa mahāpaññassa bhikkhuno vipassanā.
atk-abh01a4:794_0: Yathā hi chātajjhattassa purisassa majjhe gūthapiṇḍaṁ ṭhapetvā nānaggarasabhojanapuṇṇaṁ
atk-abh01a4:794_1: pātiṁ upaneyyuṁ, so byañjanaṁ hatthena viyūhanto taṁ gūthapiṇḍaṁ disvā ‘kimida’nti
atk-abh01a4:794_2: pucchitvā gūthapiṇḍoti vutte ‘dhi dhi, apanethā’ti bhattepi pātiyampi nirālayo hoti.
atk-abh01a4:795_0: Bhojanapātidassanasmiñhi tassa attamanakālo viya imassa bhikkhuno bālaputhujjanakāle
atk-abh01a4:795_1: pañcakkhandhe ‘ahaṁ mamā’ti gahitakālo. Gūthapiṇḍassa diṭṭhakālo viya tiṇṇaṁ lakkhaṇānaṁ
atk-abh01a4:795_2: sallakkhitakālo. Bhattepi pātiyampi nirālayakālo viya tikkhavipassakassa mahāpaññassa
atk-abh01a4:795_3: bhikkhuno ‘‘yaṁkiñci samudayadhammaṁ sabbaṁ taṁ nirodhadhamma’’nti pañcahi khandhehi
atk-abh01a4:796_0: ‘Sattaṭṭhaṅgapariṇāma’nti ettha ayaṁ vuttappabhedo aṅgapariṇāmo yathā hoti tathā
atk-abh01a4:796_2: niyameti. Keci pana therā ‘bojjhaṅgamaggaṅgajhānaṅgavisesaṁ pādakajjhānaṁ niyametī’ti
atk-abh01a4:796_3: vadanti. Keci ‘vipassanāya ārammaṇabhūtā khandhā niyamentī’ti vadanti. Keci ‘puggalajjhāsayo
atk-abh01a4:796_4: niyametī’ti vadanti. Tesampi vādesu ayaṁ saṅkhārupekkhāsaṅkhātā pubbabhāgā vuṭṭhānagāminivipassanāva
atk-abh01a4:797_0: Tatrāyaṁ anupubbīkathā – vipassanāniyamena hi sukkhavipassakassa uppannamaggopi samāpattilābhino
atk-abh01a4:797_1: jhānaṁ pādakaṁ akatvā uppannamaggopi paṭhamajjhānaṁ pādakaṁ katvā pakiṇṇakasaṅkhāre
atk-abh01a4:797_2: sammasitvā uppāditamaggopi paṭhamajjhānikova hoti. Sabbesu satta bojjhaṅgāni aṭṭha
atk-abh01a4:797_3: maggaṅgāni pañca jhānaṅgāni honti. Tesañhi pubbabhāgavipassanā somanassasahagatāpi
atk-abh01a4:797_4: upekkhāsahagatāpi hutvā vuṭṭhānakāle saṅkhārupekkhābhāvaṁ pattā somanassasahagatāva hoti.
atk-abh01a4:798_0: Pañcakanaye dutiyatatiyacatutthajjhānāni pādakāni katvā uppāditamaggesu yathākkameneva
atk-abh01a4:798_1: jhānaṁ caturaṅgikaṁ tivaṅgikaṁ duvaṅgikañca hoti. Sabbesu pana satta maggaṅgāni honti,
atk-abh01a4:798_2: catutthe cha bojjhaṅgāni. Ayaṁ viseso pādakajjhānaniyamena ceva vipassanāniyamena
atk-abh01a4:798_3: ca hoti. Tesampi hi pubbabhāgavipassanā somanassasahagatāpi upekkhāsahagatāpi hoti.
atk-abh01a4:799_0: Pañcamajjhānaṁ pādakaṁ katvā nibbattitamagge pana upekkhācittekaggatāvasena dve jhānaṅgāni
atk-abh01a4:799_1: bojjhaṅgamaggaṅgāni cha satta ceva. Ayampi viseso ubhayaniyamavasena hoti. Imasmiñhi
atk-abh01a4:799_2: naye pubbabhāgavipassanā somanassasahagatā vā upekkhāsahagatā vā hoti, vuṭṭhānagāminī
atk-abh01a4:799_3: upekkhāsahagatāva. Arūpajjhānāni pādakāni katvā uppāditamaggepi eseva nayo. Evaṁ
atk-abh01a4:799_4: pādakajjhānato vuṭṭhāya ye keci saṅkhāre sammasitvā nibbattitamaggassa āsannapadese
atk-abh01a4:799_5: vuṭṭhitā samāpatti attanā sadisabhāvaṁ karoti, bhūmivaṇṇo viya godhāvaṇṇassa.
atk-abh01a4:800_0: Dutiyattheravāde pana yato yato samāpattito vuṭṭhāya ye ye samāpattidhamme sammasitvā
atk-abh01a4:800_1: maggo nibbattito hoti taṁtaṁsamāpattisadisova hoti, sammasitasamāpattisadisoti attho.
atk-abh01a4:800_2: Sace pana kāmāvacaradhamme sammasati paṭhamajjhānikova hoti. Tatrāpi vipassanāniyamo
atk-abh01a4:801_0: Tatiyattheravāde ‘aho vatāhaṁ sattaṅgikaṁ maggaṁ pāpuṇeyyaṁ, aṭṭhaṅgikaṁ maggaṁ pāpuṇeyya’nti
atk-abh01a4:801_1: attano ajjhāsayānurūpena yaṁ yaṁ jhānaṁ pādakaṁ katvā ye vā ye vā jhānadhamme sammasitvā
atk-abh01a4:801_2: maggo nibbattito taṁtaṁjhānasadisova hoti. Pādakajjhānaṁ pana sammasitajjhānaṁ vā
atk-abh01a4:801_3: vinā, ajjhāsayamatteneva taṁ na ijjhati. Svāyamattho nandakovādasuttena dīpetabbo. Vuttañhetaṁ –
atk-abh01a4:802_0: ‘‘Seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, tadahuposathe pannarase na hoti bahuno janassa kaṅkhā vā
atk-abh01a4:802_1: vimati vā ‘ūno nu kho cando puṇṇo nu kho cando’ti, atha kho puṇṇo candotveva hoti,
atk-abh01a4:802_2: evameva kho, bhikkhave, tā bhikkhuniyo nandakassa dhammadesanāya attamanā ceva paripuṇṇasaṅkappā
atk-abh01a4:802_3: ca. Tāsaṁ, bhikkhave, pañcannaṁ bhikkhunisatānaṁ yā pacchimikā bhikkhunī sā sotāpannā
atk-abh01a4:803_0: Tāsu hi yassā bhikkhuniyā sotāpattiphalassa upanissayo, sā sotāpattiphaleneva paripuṇṇasaṅkappā
atk-abh01a4:803_1: ahosi…pe… yassā arahattassa upanissayo sā arahatteneva. Evameva attano ajjhāsayānurūpena
atk-abh01a4:803_2: yaṁ yaṁ jhānaṁ pādakaṁ katvā ye vā ye vā jhānadhamme sammasitvā maggo nibbattito
atk-abh01a4:803_3: taṁtaṁjhānasadisova so hoti. Pādakajjhānaṁ pana sammasitajjhānaṁ vā vinā, ajjhāsayamatteneva
atk-abh01a4:803_4: taṁ na ijjhatīti. Etthāpi ca vipassanāniyamo vuttanayeneva veditabbo.
atk-abh01a4:804_1: āhaṁsu – ‘bhante, yattha tāva pādakajjhānaṁ atthi tattha taṁ niyametu; yasmiṁ pana
atk-abh01a4:804_2: pādakajjhānaṁ natthi, tasmiṁ arūpabhave kiṁ niyametī’ti? ‘Āvuso, tatthapi pādakajjhānameva
atk-abh01a4:804_3: niyameti. Yo hi bhikkhu aṭṭhasamāpattilābhī paṭhamajjhānaṁ pādakaṁ katvā sotāpattimaggaphalāni
atk-abh01a4:804_4: nibbattetvā aparihīnajjhāno kālaṁ katvā arūpabhave nibbatto, paṭhamajjhānikāya sotāpattiphalasamāpattiyā
atk-abh01a4:804_5: vuṭṭhāya vipassanaṁ paṭṭhapetvā upari tīṇi maggaphalāni nibbatteti, tassa tāni paṭhamajjhānikāneva
atk-abh01a4:804_6: honti. Dutiyajjhānikādīsupi eseva nayo. Arūpe tikacatukkajjhānaṁ uppajjati, tañca
atk-abh01a4:804_7: kho lokuttaraṁ na lokiyaṁ. Evaṁ tatthāpi pādakajjhānameva niyameti āvuso’ti. ‘Sukathito, bhante, pañho’ti.
atk-abh01a4:805_0: ‘Vipassanāya ārammaṇabhūtā khandhā niyamenti; yaṁ yaṁ hi pañcakkhandhaṁ sammasitvā
atk-abh01a4:805_1: vuṭṭhāti taṁtaṁsadisova maggo hotī’ti vādiṁ moravāpivāsimahādattattherampi antevāsikā
atk-abh01a4:805_2: āhaṁsu ‘bhante, tumhākaṁ vāde doso paññāyati – rūpaṁ sammasitvā vuṭṭhitabhikkhuno
atk-abh01a4:805_3: hi rūpasadisena abyākatena maggena bhavitabbaṁ, nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaṁ nayato pariggahetvā
atk-abh01a4:805_5: āvuso, evaṁ hoti. Lokuttaramaggo hi appanaṁ appatto nāma natthi, tasmā rūpaṁ sammasitvā
atk-abh01a4:805_6: vuṭṭhitassa aṭṭhaṅgiko somanassasahagatamaggo hoti, nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaṁ sammasitvā
atk-abh01a4:805_7: vuṭṭhitassapi na sabbākārena tādiso hoti, sattaṅgiko pana upekkhāsahagatamaggo hotī’ti.
atk-abh01a4:806_1: kathayiṁsu. So āha – ‘yassa tāva pādakajjhānaṁ atthi tassa puggalajjhāsayo niyametu,
atk-abh01a4:806_2: yassa taṁ natthi tassa katarajjhāsayo niyamessati niddhanassa vuḍḍhigavesanakālo viya hotī’ti.
atk-abh01a4:807_0: Taṁ kathaṁ āharitvā tipiṭakacūḷābhayattherassa puna kathayiṁsu. So ‘pādakajjhānavato
atk-abh01a4:807_1: idaṁ kathitaṁ āvuso’ti āha. Yathā pana pādakajjhānavato, sammasitajjhānavatopi tatheva
atk-abh01a4:807_2: veditabbaṁ. Pañcamajjhānato vuṭṭhāya hi paṭhamādīni sammasato uppannamaggo paṭhamattheravādena
atk-abh01a4:807_3: pañcamajjhāniko. Dutiyavādena paṭhamādijjhāniko āpajjatīti dvepi vādā virujjhanti.
atk-abh01a4:807_4: Tatiyavādena panettha ‘yaṁ icchati tajjhāniko hotī’ti te ca vādā na virujjhanti,
atk-abh01a4:807_5: ajjhāsayo ca sātthako hotīti. Evaṁ tayopi therā paṇḍitā byattā buddhisampannāva .
atk-abh01a4:807_6: Tena tesaṁ vādaṁ tantiṁ katvā ṭhapayiṁsu. Idha pana atthameva uddharitvā tayopete
atk-abh01a4:808_0: Idāni ‘nimittaṁ paṭipadāpatī’ti ettha evaṁ aṅgapariṇāmavato maggassa uppādakāle gotrabhu
atk-abh01a4:808_1: kuto vuṭṭhāti? Maggo kutoti? Gotrabhu tāva nimittato vuṭṭhāti, pavattaṁ chettuṁ na
atk-abh01a4:808_2: sakkoti, ekatovuṭṭhāno hesa. Maggo nimittato vuṭṭhāti, pavattampi chindati ubhatovuṭṭhāno
atk-abh01a4:808_3: hesa. Tesaṁ ayaṁ uppattinayo – yasmiñhi vāre maggavuṭṭhānaṁ hoti, tasmiṁ anulomaṁ
atk-abh01a4:808_4: neva ekaṁ hoti, na pañcamaṁ. Ekañhi āsevanaṁ na labhati, pañcamaṁ bhavaṅgassa āsannattā
atk-abh01a4:808_5: pavedhati. Tadā hi javanaṁ patitaṁ nāma hoti. Tasmā neva ekaṁ hoti na pañcamaṁ. Mahāpaññassa
atk-abh01a4:808_6: pana dve anulomāni honti, tatiyaṁ gotrabhu, catutthaṁ maggacittaṁ, tīṇi phalāni,
atk-abh01a4:808_7: tato bhavaṅgotaraṇaṁ. Majjhimapaññassa tīṇi anulomāni honti, catutthaṁ gotrabhu,
atk-abh01a4:808_8: pañcamaṁ maggacittaṁ, dve phalāni, tato bhavaṅgotaraṇaṁ. Mandapaññassa cattāri anulomāni,
atk-abh01a4:808_9: honti pañcamaṁ gotrabhu, chaṭṭhaṁ maggacittaṁ, sattamaṁ phalaṁ, tato bhavaṅgotaraṇaṁ.
atk-abh01a4:808_10: Tatra mahāpaññamandapaññānaṁ vasena akathetvā majjhimapaññassa vasena kathetabbaṁ.
atk-abh01a4:809_0: Yasmiñhi vāre maggavuṭṭhānaṁ hoti, tasmiṁ kiriyāhetukamanoviññāṇadhātu upekkhāsahagatā
atk-abh01a4:809_1: manodvārāvajjanaṁ hutvā vipassanāgocare khandhe ārammaṇaṁ katvā bhavaṅgaṁ āvaṭṭeti.
atk-abh01a4:809_2: Tadanantaraṁ teneva āvajjanena gahitakkhandhe gahetvā uppajjati paṭhamaṁ javanaṁ
atk-abh01a4:809_3: anulomañāṇaṁ. Taṁ tesu khandhesu aniccāti vā dukkhāti vā anattāti vā pavattitvā oḷārikaṁ
atk-abh01a4:809_4: oḷārikaṁ saccapaṭicchādakatamaṁ vinodetvā tīṇi lakkhaṇāni bhiyyo bhiyyo pākaṭāni
atk-abh01a4:809_5: katvā nirujjhati. Tadanantaraṁ uppajjati dutiyānulomaṁ. Tesu purimaṁ anāsevanaṁ.
atk-abh01a4:809_6: Dutiyassa purimaṁ āsevanaṁ hoti. Tampi laddhāsevanattā tikkhaṁ sūraṁ pasannaṁ hutvā
atk-abh01a4:809_8: vinodetvā tīṇi lakkhaṇāni bhiyyo bhiyyo pākaṭāni katvā nirujjhati. Tadanantaraṁ uppajjati
atk-abh01a4:809_9: tatiyānulomaṁ. Tassa dutiyaṁ āsevanaṁ hoti. Tampi laddhāsevanattā tikkhaṁ sūraṁ pasannaṁ
atk-abh01a4:809_10: hutvā tasmiṁyevārammaṇe tenevākārena pavattitvā tadavasesaṁ aṇusahagataṁ saccapaṭicchādakatamaṁ
atk-abh01a4:809_11: vinodetvā niravasesaṁ katvā tīṇi lakkhaṇāni bhiyyo bhiyyo pākaṭāni katvā nirujjhati.
atk-abh01a4:809_12: Evaṁ tīhi anulomehi saccapaṭicchādakatame vinodite tadanantaraṁ uppajjati gotrabhuññāṇaṁ
atk-abh01a4:810_0: Tatrāyaṁ upamā – eko kira cakkhumā puriso nakkhattayogaṁ jānissāmīti rattibhāge nikkhamitvā
atk-abh01a4:810_1: candaṁ passituṁ uddhaṁ ullokesi. Tassa valāhakehi paṭicchannattā cando na paññāyittha.
atk-abh01a4:810_2: Atheko vāto uṭṭhahitvā thūlathūle valāhake viddhaṁsesi. Aparo majjhime. Aparo sukhume.
atk-abh01a4:810_3: Tato so puriso vigatavalāhake nabhe candaṁ disvā nakkhattayogaṁ aññāsi.
atk-abh01a4:811_1: vātā viya tīṇi anulomacittāni. Cakkhumā puriso viya gotrabhuññāṇaṁ. Cando viya nibbānaṁ.
atk-abh01a4:811_2: Ekekassa vātassa yathākkamena valāhakattayaviddhaṁsanaṁ viya ekekassa anulomacittassa
atk-abh01a4:811_3: saccapaṭicchādakatamavinodanaṁ. Vigatavalāhake nabhe tassa purisassa visuddhacandadassanaṁ
atk-abh01a4:811_4: viya vigate saccapaṭicchādake tame gotrabhuññāṇassa suvisuddhanibbānārammaṇakaraṇaṁ.
atk-abh01a4:812_0: Yatheva hi tayo vātā candapaṭicchādake valāhakeyeva viddhaṁsetuṁ sakkonti, na candaṁ
atk-abh01a4:812_1: daṭṭhuṁ, evaṁ anulomāni saccapaṭicchādakatameyeva vinodetuṁ sakkonti, na nibbānaṁ
atk-abh01a4:812_2: ārammaṇaṁ kātuṁ . Yathā so puriso candameva daṭṭhuṁ sakkoti na valāhake viddhaṁsetuṁ,
atk-abh01a4:812_3: evaṁ gotrabhuññāṇaṁ nibbānameva ārammaṇaṁ kātuṁ sakkoti na kilesatamaṁ vinodetuṁ.
atk-abh01a4:812_4: Evaṁ anulomaṁ saṅkhārārammaṇaṁ hoti, gotrabhu nibbānārammaṇaṁ.
atk-abh01a4:813_0: Yadi hi gotrabhu anulomena gahitārammaṇaṁ gaṇheyya puna anulomaṁ taṁ anubandheyyāti
atk-abh01a4:813_1: maggavuṭṭhānameva na bhaveyya. Gotrabhuññāṇaṁ pana anulomassa ārammaṇaṁ aggahetvā
atk-abh01a4:813_2: taṁ apacchatopavattikaṁ katvā sayaṁ anāvajjanampi samānaṁ āvajjanaṭṭhāne ṭhatvā evaṁ
atk-abh01a4:813_3: nibbattāhīti maggassa saññaṁ datvā viya nirujjhati. Maggopi tena dinnasaññaṁ amuñcitvāva
atk-abh01a4:813_4: avīcisantativasena taṁ ñāṇaṁ anubandhamāno anibbiddhapubbaṁ apadālitapubbaṁ lobhakkhandhaṁ
atk-abh01a4:814_0: Tatrāyaṁ upamā – eko kira issāso dhanusatamatthake phalakasataṁ ṭhapāpetvā vatthena
atk-abh01a4:814_1: mukhaṁ veṭhetvā saraṁ sannayhitvā cakkayante aṭṭhāsi. Añño puriso cakkayantaṁ āvañchitvā
atk-abh01a4:814_2: yadā issāsassa phalakasataṁ abhimukhaṁ hoti tadā tattha daṇḍakena saññaṁ deti, issāso
atk-abh01a4:814_3: daṇḍakasaññaṁ amuñcitvāva saraṁ khipitvā phalakasataṁ nibbijjhati. Tattha daṇḍakasaññā
atk-abh01a4:814_4: viya gotrabhuññāṇaṁ. Issāso viya maggañāṇaṁ. Issāsassa daṇḍakasaññaṁ amuñcitvāva
atk-abh01a4:814_5: phalakasatanibbijjhanaṁ viya maggañāṇassa gotrabhuññāṇena dinnasaññaṁ amuñcitvāva
atk-abh01a4:814_6: nibbānaṁ ārammaṇaṁ katvā anibbiddhapubbaapadālitapubbānaṁ lobhakkhandhādīnaṁ nibbijjhanapadālanaṁ.
atk-abh01a4:814_7: Bhūmiladdhavaṭṭasetusamugghātakaraṇantipi etadeva. Maggassa hi ekameva kiccaṁ anusayappajahanaṁ.
atk-abh01a4:814_8: Iti so anusaye pajahanto nimittā vuṭṭhāti nāma, pavattaṁ chindati nāma. ‘Nimitta’nti
atk-abh01a4:814_10: Taṁ duvidhaṁ hoti – upādinnakaṁ anupādinnakanti. Tesu maggassa anupādinnakato vuṭṭhānacchāyā
atk-abh01a4:815_0: Sotāpattimaggena hi cattāri diṭṭhigatasampayuttāni vicikicchāsahagatanti pañca cittāni
atk-abh01a4:815_1: pahīyanti. Tāni rūpaṁ samuṭṭhāpenti. Taṁ anupādinnakarūpakkhandho. Tāni cittāni viññāṇakkhandho.
atk-abh01a4:815_2: Taṁsampayuttā vedanā saññā saṅkhārā tayo arūpakkhandhā. Tattha sace sotāpannassa
atk-abh01a4:815_3: sotāpattimaggo abhāvito abhavissa tāni pañca cittāni chasu ārammaṇesu pariyuṭṭhānaṁ
atk-abh01a4:815_4: pāpuṇeyyuṁ. Sotāpattimaggo pana tesaṁ pariyuṭṭhānenappattiṁ vārayamāno setusamugghātaṁ
atk-abh01a4:816_0: Sakadāgāmimaggena cattāri diṭṭhigatavippayuttāni dve domanassasahagatānīti oḷārikakāmarāgabyāpādavasena
atk-abh01a4:816_1: cha cittāni pahīyanti. Anāgāmimaggena aṇusahagatakāmarāgabyāpādavasena tāni eva cha
atk-abh01a4:816_2: cittāni pahīyanti. Arahattamaggena cattāri diṭṭhigatavippayuttāni uddhaccasahagatañcāti
atk-abh01a4:816_3: pañca akusalacittāni pahīyanti. Tattha sace tesaṁ ariyānaṁ te maggā abhāvitā assu,
atk-abh01a4:816_4: tāni cittāni chasu ārammaṇesu pariyuṭṭhānaṁ pāpuṇeyyuṁ. Te pana tesaṁ maggā pariyuṭṭhānappattiṁ
atk-abh01a4:816_5: vārayamānā setusamugghātaṁ abhabbuppattikabhāvaṁ kurumānā anupādinnakato vuṭṭhahanti nāma.
atk-abh01a4:817_0: Upādinnakato vuṭṭhānacchāyā dissatīti vatvā upādinnakato vuṭṭhātītipi vadiṁsu. Sace
atk-abh01a4:817_1: hi sotāpannassa sotāpattimaggo abhāvito abhavissa, ṭhapetvā satta bhave anamatagge
atk-abh01a4:817_2: saṁsāravaṭṭe upādinnakappavattaṁ pavatteyya. Kasmā? Tassa pavattiyā hetūnaṁ atthitāya.
atk-abh01a4:817_3: Tīṇi saṁyojanāni diṭṭhānusayo vicikicchānusayoti ime pana pañca kilese sotāpattimaggo
atk-abh01a4:817_4: uppajjamānova samugghāteti. Idāni kuto sotāpannassa satta bhave ṭhapetvā anamatagge
atk-abh01a4:817_5: saṁsāravaṭṭe upādinnakappavattaṁ pavattissati? Evaṁ sotāpattimaggo upādinnakappavattaṁ
atk-abh01a4:818_0: Sace sakadāgāmissa sakadāgāmimaggo abhāvito abhavissa, ṭhapetvā dve bhave pañcasu
atk-abh01a4:818_1: bhavesu upādinnakapavattaṁ pavatteyya. Kasmā? Tassa pavattiyā hetūnaṁ atthitāya.
atk-abh01a4:818_2: Oḷārikāni kāmarāgapaṭighasaṁyojanāni oḷāriko kāmarāgānusayo paṭighānusayoti ime pana
atk-abh01a4:818_3: cattāro kilese so maggo uppajjamānova samugghāteti. Idāni kuto sakadāgāmissa dve
atk-abh01a4:818_4: bhave ṭhapetvā pañcasu bhavesu upādinnakappavattaṁ pavattissati? Evaṁ sakadāgāmimaggo
atk-abh01a4:818_5: upādinnakappavattaṁ appavattaṁ kurumāno upādinnakato vuṭṭhāti nāma.
atk-abh01a4:819_0: Sace anāgāmissa anāgāmimaggo abhāvito abhavissa, ṭhapetvā ekaṁ bhavaṁ dutiyabhave
atk-abh01a4:819_1: upādinnakappavattaṁ pavatteyya. Kasmā? Tassa pavattiyā hetūnaṁ atthitāya. Aṇusahagatāni
atk-abh01a4:819_2: kāmarāgapaṭighasaṁyojanāni aṇusahagato kāmarāgānusayo paṭighānusayoti ime pana cattāro
atk-abh01a4:819_3: kilese so maggo uppajjamānova samugghāteti. Idāni kuto anāgāmissa ekaṁ bhavaṁ ṭhapetvā
atk-abh01a4:819_4: dutiyabhave upādinnakappavattaṁ pavattissati? Evaṁ anāgāmimaggo upādinnakappavattaṁ
atk-abh01a4:820_0: Sace arahato arahattamaggo abhāvito abhavissa, rūpārūpabhavesu upādinnakappavattaṁ
atk-abh01a4:820_1: pavatteyya. Kasmā? Tassa pavattiyā hetūnaṁ atthitāya . Rūparāgo arūparāgo māno uddhaccaṁ
atk-abh01a4:820_2: avijjā mānānusayo bhavarāgānusayo avijjānusayoti ime pana aṭṭha kilese so maggo uppajjamānova
atk-abh01a4:820_3: samugghāteti. Idāni kuto khīṇāsavassa punabbhave upādinnakappavattaṁ pavattissati?
atk-abh01a4:820_4: Evaṁ arahattamaggo upādinnakappavattaṁ appavattaṁ kurumāno upādinnakato vuṭṭhāti nāma.
atk-abh01a4:821: Sotāpattimaggo cettha apāyabhavato vuṭṭhāti, sakadāgāmimaggo sugatikāmabhavekadesato, anāgāmimaggo kāmabhavato, arahattamaggo rūpārūpabhavato sabbabhavehipi vuṭṭhāti evāti vadanti.
atk-abh01a4:822_0: Imassa panatthassa vibhāvanatthaṁ ayaṁ pāḷi – ‘‘sotāpattimaggañāṇena abhisaṅkhāraviññāṇassa
atk-abh01a4:822_1: nirodhena satta bhave ṭhapetvā anamatagge saṁsāravaṭṭe ye uppajjeyyuṁ, nāmañca rūpañca
atk-abh01a4:822_2: etthete nirujjhanti vūpasamanti atthaṁ gacchanti paṭippassambhanti.
atk-abh01a4:823_0: ‘Sakadāgāmimaggañāṇena abhisaṅkhāraviññāṇassa nirodhena dve bhave ṭhapetvā pañcasu
atk-abh01a4:823_1: bhavesu ye uppajjeyyuṁ, nāmañca rūpañca etthete nirujjhanti vūpasamanti atthaṁ gacchanti paṭippassambhanti.
atk-abh01a4:824_0: ‘Anāgāmimaggañāṇena abhisaṅkhāraviññāṇassa nirodhena ekaṁ bhavaṁ ṭhapetvā kāmadhātuyā
atk-abh01a4:824_1: dvīsu bhavesu ye uppajjeyyuṁ, nāmañca rūpañca etthete nirujjhanti vūpasamanti atthaṁ
atk-abh01a4:825_1: vā ye uppajjeyyuṁ , nāmañca rūpañca etthete nirujjhanti vūpasamanti atthaṁ gacchanti
atk-abh01a4:825_2: paṭippassambhanti. Arahato anupādisesāya nibbānadhātuyā parinibbāyantassa carimaviññāṇassa
atk-abh01a4:825_3: nirodhena paññā ca sati ca nāmañca rūpañca etthete nirujjhanti vūpasamanti atthaṁ
atk-abh01a4:825_4: gacchanti paṭippassambhantī’’ti (cūḷani. ajitamāṇavapucchāniddesa 6). Ayaṁ tāva nimitte vinicchayo.
atk-abh01a4:826_0: ‘Paṭipadāpatī’ti – ettha pana paṭipadā calati na calatīti? Calati. Tathāgatassa hi
atk-abh01a4:826_1: sāriputtattherassa ca cattāropi maggā sukhapaṭipadā khippābhiññā ahesuṁ. Mahāmoggallānattherassa
atk-abh01a4:826_2: paṭhamamaggo sukhapaṭipado khippābhiñño, upari tayo maggā dukkhapaṭipadā khippābhiññā.
atk-abh01a4:826_3: Kasmā? Niddābhibhūtattā. Sammāsambuddho kira sattāhaṁ daharakumārakaṁ viya theraṁ
atk-abh01a4:826_4: parihari. Theropi ekadivasaṁ niddāyamāno nisīdi. Atha naṁ satthā āha – ‘‘pacalāyasi
atk-abh01a4:826_5: no tvaṁ, moggallāna, pacalāyasi no tvaṁ moggallānā’’ti (a. ni. 7.61). Evarūpassapi
atk-abh01a4:826_6: mahābhiññappattassa sāvakassa paṭipadā calati, sesānaṁ kiṁ na calissati? Ekaccassa
atk-abh01a4:826_7: hi bhikkhuno cattāropi maggā dukkhapaṭipadā dandhābhiññā honti, ekaccassa dukkhapaṭipadā
atk-abh01a4:826_8: khippābhiññā, ekaccassa sukhapaṭipadā dandhābhiññā, ekaccassa sukhapaṭipadā khippābhiññā.
atk-abh01a4:826_9: Ekaccassa paṭhamamaggo dukkhapaṭipado dandhābhiñño hoti, dutiyamaggo dukkhapaṭipado
atk-abh01a4:826_10: khippābhiñño, tatiyamaggo sukhapaṭipado dandhābhiñño, catutthamaggo sukhapaṭipado khippābhiññoti.
atk-abh01a4:827_0: Yathā ca paṭipadā evaṁ adhipatipi calati eva. Ekaccassa hi bhikkhuno cattāropi maggā
atk-abh01a4:827_1: chandādhipateyyā honti, ekaccassa vīriyādhipateyyā, ekaccassa cittādhipateyyā, ekaccassa
atk-abh01a4:827_2: vīmaṁsādhipateyyā. Ekaccassa pana paṭhamamaggo chandādhipateyyo hoti, dutiyo vīriyādhipateyyo,
atk-abh01a4:830_0: 357. Idāni yasmā lokuttarakusalaṁ bhāvento na kevalaṁ upanijjhāyanaṭṭhena jhānaṁyeva
atk-abh01a4:830_1: bhāveti, niyyānaṭṭhena pana maggampi bhāveti, upaṭṭhānaṭṭhena satipaṭṭhānampi, padahanaṭṭhena
atk-abh01a4:830_2: sammappadhānampi, ijjhanaṭṭhena iddhipādampi, adhipatiyaṭṭhena indriyampi, akampiyaṭṭhena
atk-abh01a4:830_3: balampi, bujjhanaṭṭhena bojjhaṅgampi, tathaṭṭhena saccampi, avikkhepaṭṭhena samathampi,
atk-abh01a4:830_4: suññataṭṭhena dhammampi, rāsaṭṭhena khandhampi, āyatanaṭṭhena āyatanampi, suññasabhāvanissattaṭṭhena
atk-abh01a4:830_5: dhātumpi, paccayaṭṭhena āhārampi, phusanaṭṭhena phassampi, vedayitaṭṭhena vedanampi,
atk-abh01a4:830_6: sañjānanaṭṭhena saññampi, cetayitaṭṭhena cetanampi, vijānanaṭṭhena cittampi bhāveti,
atk-abh01a4:830_7: tasmā etesaṁ ekūnavīsatiyā padānaṁ dassanatthaṁ puna katame dhammā kusalātiādi vuttaṁ.
atk-abh01a4:830_8: Evaṁ ‘idampi bhāveti, idampi bhāvetī’ti puggalajjhāsayena ceva desanāvilāsena ca
atk-abh01a4:830_9: vīsati nayā desitā honti . Dhammaṁ sotuṁ nisinnadevaparisāya hi ye upanijjhāyanaṭṭhena
atk-abh01a4:830_10: lokuttaraṁ ‘jhāna’nti kathite bujjhanti, tesaṁ sappāyavasena jhānanti kathitaṁ…pe…
atk-abh01a4:830_11: ye vijānanaṭṭhena ‘citta’nti vutte bujjhanti, tesaṁ sappāyavasena cittanti kathitaṁ.
atk-abh01a4:831_1: chaasādhāraṇañāṇayogena ca desanaṁ yadicchakaṁ niyametvā dasseti. Icchanto upanijjhāyanaṭṭhena
atk-abh01a4:831_2: lokuttaraṁ jhānanti dasseti, icchanto niyyānaṭṭhena…pe… vijānanaṭṭhena lokuttaraṁ
atk-abh01a4:831_3: cittanti. Ayaṁ ‘desanāvilāso’ nāma. Tattha yatheva lokuttaraṁ jhānanti vuttaṭṭhāne
atk-abh01a4:831_4: dasa nayā vibhattā, evaṁ maggādīsupi teyeva veditabbā. Iti vīsatiyā ṭhānesu dasa
atk-abh01a4:831_5: dasa katvā dve nayasatāni vibhattāni honti.
atk-abh01a4:832_0: 358. Idāni adhipatibhedaṁ dassetuṁ puna katame dhammā kusalātiādi āraddhaṁ. Tattha
atk-abh01a4:832_1: chandaṁ dhuraṁ jeṭṭhakaṁ pubbaṅgamaṁ katvā nibbattitaṁ lokuttaraṁ jhānaṁ chandādhipateyyaṁ
atk-abh01a4:832_2: nāma. Sesesupi eseva nayo. Iti purimasmiṁ suddhike dvenayasatāni chandādhipateyyādīsupi
atk-abh01a4:832_3: dve dveti nayasahassena bhājetvā paṭhamamaggaṁ dassesi dhammarājā.
atk-abh01a4:835_0: 361. Idāni dutiyamaggādīnaṁ dassanatthaṁ puna katame dhammā kusalātiādi āraddhaṁ.
atk-abh01a4:835_1: Tattha kāmarāgabyāpādānaṁ tanubhāvāyāti etesaṁ kilesānaṁ tanubhāvatthāya. Tattha
atk-abh01a4:835_2: dvīhi kāraṇehi tanubhāvo veditabbo – adhiccuppattiyā ca pariyuṭṭhānamandatāya ca.
atk-abh01a4:835_3: Sakadāgāmissa hi, vaṭṭānusārimahājanasseva, kilesā abhiṇhaṁ nuppajjanti, kadāci kadāci
atk-abh01a4:835_4: uppajjanti; uppajjantāpi viraḷākārā hutvā uppajjanti, viraḷavāpitakhette aṅkurā viya.
atk-abh01a4:835_5: Uppajjamānāpi, ca vaṭṭānusārimahājanasseva, maddantā pharantā chādentā andhakāraṁ
atk-abh01a4:835_6: karontā nuppajjanti. Dvīhi pana maggehi pahīnattā mandā mandā uppajjanti. Tanukākārā
atk-abh01a4:835_7: hutvā uppajjanti, abbhapaṭalaṁ viya makkhikāpattaṁ viya ca.
atk-abh01a4:836_0: Tattha keci therā vadanti – ‘sakadāgāmissa kilesā kiñcāpi cirena uppajjanti, bahalāva
atk-abh01a4:836_1: pana hutvā uppajjanti, tathā hissa puttā ca dhītaro ca dissantī’ti. Etaṁ pana appamāṇaṁ.
atk-abh01a4:836_2: Puttadhītaro hi aṅgapaccaṅgaparāmasanamattenapi honti. Dvīhi pana maggehi pahīnattā
atk-abh01a4:836_3: natthi kilesānaṁ bahalatāti. Dvīhi eva kāraṇehissa kilesānaṁ tanubhāvo veditabbo
atk-abh01a4:837: Dutiyāyāti gaṇanavasenāpi dutiyuppattivasenāpi dutiyāya. Bhūmiyā pattiyāti sāmaññaphalassa paṭilābhatthāya. Tatiyacatutthesupi eseva nayo. Visesamattaṁyeva pana vakkhāma.
atk-abh01a4:838_0: Aññindriyanti ājānanakaṁ indriyaṁ. Paṭhamamaggena ñātamariyādaṁ anatikkamitvā tesaṁyeva
atk-abh01a4:838_1: tena maggena ñātānaṁ catusaccadhammānaṁ jānanakaṁ indriyanti vuttaṁ hoti. Niddesavārepissa
atk-abh01a4:838_2: imināva nayena attho veditabbo. Koṭṭhāsavārepi imināva saddhiṁ navindriyāni honti.
atk-abh01a4:841: 362. Tatiye anavasesappahānāyāti tesaṁyeva sakadāgāmimaggena tanubhūtānaṁ saṁyojanānaṁ nissesapajahanatthāya.
atk-abh01a4:842_1: uddhambhāgiyasaṁyojanānaṁ nissesapajahanatthāya. Tattha rūparāgoti rūpabhave chandarāgo.
atk-abh01a4:842_2: Arūparāgoti arūpabhave chandarāgo. Mānoti arahattamaggavajjhako māno eva. Tathā uddhaccāvijjā.
atk-abh01a4:842_3: Imesupi dvīsu maggesu navamaṁ aññindriyameva hoti.
atk-abh01a4:844_0: Sabbamaggesu padapaṭipāṭiyā samasaṭṭhipadāni, catūhi apaṇṇakaṅgehi saddhiṁ catusaṭṭhi
atk-abh01a4:844_1: honti. Asambhinnato pana tettiṁsa. Koṭṭhāsavārasuññatavārā pākatikā eva. Yathā ca
atk-abh01a4:844_2: pana paṭhamamagge evaṁ dutiyādīsupi nayasahassamevāti cattāro magge catūhi nayasahassehi
atk-abh01a4:845_0: Saccavibhaṅge pana saṭṭhi nayasahassāni lokuttarāni imesaṁ eva vasena nikkhittāni.
atk-abh01a4:845_1: Satipaṭṭhānavibhaṅge vīsati nayasahassāni lokuttarāni, sammappadhānavibhaṅge vīsati,
atk-abh01a4:845_2: iddhipādavibhaṅge dvattiṁsa, bojjhaṅgavibhaṅge dvattiṁsa, maggaṅgavibhaṅge aṭṭhavīsati
atk-abh01a4:845_3: nayasahassāni lokuttarāni imesaṁ eva vasena nikkhittāni.
atk-abh01a4:846_0: Idha pana catūsu maggesu cattāriyeva nayasahassāni. Tesu paṭhamajjhānike paṭhamamagge
atk-abh01a4:846_1: aṭṭhaṅgāni bhājitāni; tathā dutiyādīsu. Tattha paṭhamamagge sammādiṭṭhi micchādiṭṭhiṁ
atk-abh01a4:846_3: veditabbā. Evaṁ sante ‘paṭhamamaggeneva dvāsaṭṭhiyā diṭṭhigatānaṁ pahīnattā uparimaggattayena
atk-abh01a4:846_4: pahātabbā diṭṭhi nāma natthi. Tattha sammādiṭṭhīti nāmaṁ kathaṁ hotī’ti? ‘Yathā visaṁ
atk-abh01a4:846_5: atthi vā, hotu mā vā, agado agado tveva vuccati, evaṁ micchādiṭṭhi atthi vā, hotu
atk-abh01a4:846_6: mā vā, ayaṁ sammādiṭṭhi eva nāma’.
atk-abh01a4:847_0: ‘Yadi evaṁ nāmamattamevetaṁ hoti, uparimaggattaye pana sammādiṭṭhiyā kiccābhāvo āpajjati,
atk-abh01a4:847_1: maggaṅgāni na paripūrenti, tasmā sammādiṭṭhi sakiccakā kātabbā maggaṅgāni pūretabbānī’ti.
atk-abh01a4:847_2: Sakiccakā cettha sammādiṭṭhi yathālābhaniyamena dīpetabbā. Uparimaggattayavajjho
atk-abh01a4:847_3: hi eko māno atthi, so diṭṭhiṭṭhāne tiṭṭhati. Sā taṁ mānaṁ pajahatīti sammādiṭṭhi.
atk-abh01a4:847_4: Sotāpattimaggasmiñhi sammādiṭṭhi micchādiṭṭhiṁ pajahati. Sotāpannassa pana sakadāgāmimaggavajjho
atk-abh01a4:847_5: māno atthi, so diṭṭhiṭṭhāne tiṭṭhati sā taṁ mānaṁ pajahatīti sammādiṭṭhi. Tasseva
atk-abh01a4:847_6: sattaakusalacittasahajāto saṅkappo atthi. Teheva cittehi vācaṅgacopanaṁ atthi, kāyaṅgacopanaṁ
atk-abh01a4:847_7: atthi , paccayaparibhogo atthi, sahajātavāyāmo atthi, asatibhāvo atthi, sahajātacittekaggatā
atk-abh01a4:847_8: atthi. Ete micchāsaṅkappādayo nāma sakadāgāmimagge sammāsaṅkappādayo. Tesaṁ pahānena
atk-abh01a4:847_9: sammāsaṅkappādayoti veditabbā. Evaṁ sakadāgāmimagge aṭṭhaṅgāni sakiccakāni katvā
atk-abh01a4:847_10: āgatāni. Sakadāgāmissa anāgāmimaggavajjho māno atthi. So diṭṭhiṭṭhāne tiṭṭhati. Tasseva
atk-abh01a4:847_11: sattahi cittehi sahajātā saṅkappādayo. Tesaṁ pahānena anāgāmimagge aṭṭhannaṁ aṅgānaṁ
atk-abh01a4:847_12: sakiccakatā veditabbā. Anāgāmissa arahattamaggavajjho māno atthi. So diṭṭhiṭṭhāne
atk-abh01a4:847_13: tiṭṭhati. Yāni panassa pañca akusalacittāni, tehi sahajātā saṅkappādayo. Tesaṁ pahānena
atk-abh01a4:848_0: Imesu catūsu maggesu paṭhamamaggena cattāri saccāni diṭṭhāni. ‘Uparimaggattayaṁ diṭṭhakameva
atk-abh01a4:848_1: passati, adiṭṭhakaṁ passatī’ti diṭṭhakameva passatīti ayaṁ ācariyānaṁ samānatthakathā.
atk-abh01a4:848_2: Vitaṇḍavādī panāha ‘adiṭṭhaṁ passatī’ti. So vattabbo – ‘paṭhamamagge katamaṁ indriyaṁ
atk-abh01a4:848_4: Vuttepi ‘aññindriya’nti vakkhati. So vattabbo – ‘adiṭṭhasaccadassane sati uparimaggesupi
atk-abh01a4:848_5: anaññātaññassāmītindriyameva bhājehi. Evaṁ te pañho samessatī’ti. ‘Kilese pana aññe
atk-abh01a4:848_6: añño pajahati; pahīne eva pajahatī’ti? ‘Aññe añño pajahatī’ti. ‘Yadi aññe añño, appahīne
atk-abh01a4:848_7: kilese pajahati. Saccānipi adiṭṭhāneva passatī’ti evaṁvādī puggalo pucchitabbo –
atk-abh01a4:848_8: ‘saccāni nāma katī’ti? Jānanto ‘cattārī’ti vakkhati. So vattabbo – ‘tava vāde soḷasa
atk-abh01a4:848_9: saccāni āpajjanti. Tvaṁ buddhehipi adiṭṭhaṁ passasi. Bahusaccako nāma tvaṁ. Evaṁ
atk-abh01a4:848_10: mā gaṇha. Saccadassanaṁ nāma apubbaṁ natthi, kilese pana appahīne pajahatī’ti.
atk-abh01a4:849_0: Tattha saccadassanassa apubbābhāve peḷopamaṁ nāma gahitaṁ – ekassa kira cattāro ratanapeḷā
atk-abh01a4:849_1: sāragabbhe ṭhapitā. So rattibhāge peḷāsu uppannakicco dvāraṁ vivaritvā, dīpaṁ jāletvā,
atk-abh01a4:849_2: dīpena vihate andhakāre, peḷāsu pākaṭabhāvaṁ gatāsu, tāsu kiccaṁ katvā dvāraṁ pidahitvā
atk-abh01a4:849_3: gato. Puna andhakāraṁ avatthari. Dutiyavārepi tatiyavārepi tatheva akāsi. Catutthavāre
atk-abh01a4:849_4: dvāre vivaṭe andhakāre peḷā na paññāyantīti vīmaṁsantasseva sūriyo uggañchi, sūriyobhāsena
atk-abh01a4:849_5: vihate andhakāre peḷāsu kiccaṁ katvā pakkāmi.
atk-abh01a4:850_0: Tattha cattāro peḷā viya cattāri saccāni. Tāsu kicce uppanne dvāravivaraṇakālo viya
atk-abh01a4:850_2: Dīpo bhāso viya sotāpattimaggobhāso. Vihate andhakāre tassa purisassa peḷānaṁ pākaṭabhāvo
atk-abh01a4:850_3: viya maggañāṇassa saccānaṁ pākaṭabhāvo. Maggañāṇassa pākaṭāni pana maggasamaṅgissa
atk-abh01a4:850_4: puggalassa pākaṭāneva honti. Peḷāsu kiccaṁ katvā gatakālo viya sotāpattimaggassa
atk-abh01a4:850_5: attanā pahātabbakilese pajahitvā niruddhakālo. Puna andhakārāvattharaṇaṁ viya uparimaggattayavajjhasaccapaṭicchādakatamaṁ.
atk-abh01a4:851_0: Dutiyavāre dvāravivaraṇakālo viya sakadāgāmimaggassa vipassanābhinīharaṇakālo. Dīpobhāso
atk-abh01a4:851_1: viya sakadāgāmimaggobhāso. Peḷāsu kiccaṁ katvā gatakālo viya sakadāgāmimaggassa attanā
atk-abh01a4:851_2: pahātabbakilese pajahitvā niruddhakālo. Puna andhakārāvattharaṇaṁ viya uparimaggadvayavajjhasaccapaṭicchādakatamaṁ.
atk-abh01a4:852_0: Tatiyavāre dvāravivaraṇakālo viya anāgāmimaggassa vipassanābhinīharaṇakālo. Dīpobhāso
atk-abh01a4:852_1: viya anāgāmimaggobhāso. Peḷāsu kiccaṁ katvā gatakālo viya anāgāmimaggassa attanā
atk-abh01a4:852_2: pahātabbakilese pajahitvā niruddhakālo. Puna andhakārāvattharaṇaṁ viya upariarahattamaggavajjhasaccapaṭicchādakatamaṁ.
atk-abh01a4:853_0: Catutthavāre dvāravivaraṇakālo viya arahattamaggassa vipassanābhinīharaṇakālo. Sūriyuggamanaṁ
atk-abh01a4:853_1: viya arahattamagguppādo. Andhakāravidhamanaṁ viya arahattamaggassa saccapaṭicchādakatamavinodanaṁ
atk-abh01a4:853_2: . Vihate andhakāre tassa peḷānaṁ pākaṭabhāvo viya arahattamaggañāṇassa catunnaṁ saccānaṁ
atk-abh01a4:853_3: pākaṭabhāvo. Ñāṇassa pākaṭāni pana puggalassa pākaṭāneva honti. Peḷāsu kiccaṁ katvā
atk-abh01a4:853_4: gatakālo viya arahattamaggassa sabbakilesakhepanaṁ. Sūriyuggamanato paṭṭhāya ālokasseva
atk-abh01a4:853_5: pavattikālo viya arahattamaggassa uppannakālato paṭṭhāya puna saccapaṭicchādakatamābhāvo
atk-abh01a4:854_0: Diṭṭhakameva hi passati. ‘Kilese pana aññe añño pajahatī’ti ettha khāropamaṁ nāma
atk-abh01a4:854_1: gahitaṁ. Eko puriso kiliṭṭhaṁ vatthaṁ rajakassa adāsi. Rajako ūsakhāraṁ chārikakhāraṁ
atk-abh01a4:854_2: gomayakhāranti tayo khāre datvā khārehi khāditabhāvaṁ ñatvā udake vikkhāletvā oḷārikoḷārikaṁ
atk-abh01a4:854_3: malaṁ pavāhesi. Tato na tāva parisuddhanti dutiyampi tatheva khāre datvā, udake vikkhāletvā,
atk-abh01a4:854_4: tato nātisaṇhataraṁ malaṁ pavāhesi. Tato na tāva parisuddhanti tatiyampi te khāre
atk-abh01a4:854_5: datvā udake vikkhāletvā tato saṇhataraṁ malaṁ pavāhesi. Tato na tāva parisuddhanti
atk-abh01a4:854_6: catutthampi te khāre datvā, udake vikkhāletvā aṁsuabbhantaragatampi nissesaṁ malaṁ
atk-abh01a4:854_7: pavāhetvā sāmikassa adāsi. So gandhakaraṇḍake pakkhipitvā icchiticchitakāle paridahati.
atk-abh01a4:855_0: Tattha kiliṭṭhavatthaṁ viya kilesānugataṁ cittaṁ. Tividhakhāradānakālo viya tīsu
atk-abh01a4:855_1: anupassanāsu kammassa pavattanakālo. Udake vikkhāletvā oḷārikoḷārikamalappavāhanaṁ
atk-abh01a4:855_2: viya sotāpattimaggena pañcakilesakhepanaṁ. Dutiyampi tesaṁ khārānaṁ anuppadānaṁ viya
atk-abh01a4:855_3: ‘na tāva parisuddhaṁ idaṁ citta’nti tāsuyeva tīsu anupassanāsu kammappavattanaṁ.
atk-abh01a4:855_5: Tato ‘na tāva parisuddhaṁ vattha’nti puna khārattayadānaṁ viya ‘na tāva parisuddhaṁ
atk-abh01a4:855_6: idaṁ citta’nti tāsuyeva tīsu anupassanāsu kammappavattanaṁ. Tato saṇhataramalappavāhanaṁ
atk-abh01a4:855_7: viya anāgāmimaggena aṇusahagatasaṁyojanadvayakhepanaṁ. ‘Na tāva parisuddhaṁ vattha’nti
atk-abh01a4:855_8: puna khārattayadānaṁ viya ‘na tāva parisuddhaṁ idaṁ citta’nti tāsuyeva tīsu anupassanāsu
atk-abh01a4:855_9: kammappavattanaṁ. Tato vikkhālanena aṁsuabbhantaragate male pavāhetvā parisuddhassa
atk-abh01a4:855_10: rajatapaṭṭasadisassa gandhakaraṇḍake nikkhittassa vatthassa icchiticchitakkhaṇe paridahanaṁ
atk-abh01a4:855_11: viya arahattamaggena aṭṭhannaṁ kilesānaṁ khepitattā parisuddhassa khīṇāsavacittassa
atk-abh01a4:855_12: icchiticchitakkhaṇe phalasamāpattivihārena vītināmanaṁ. Idaṁ ‘aññe añño kilese pajahatī’ti
atk-abh01a4:856_0: ‘‘Seyyathāpi , āvuso, vatthaṁ saṁkiliṭṭhaṁ malaggahitaṁ, tamenaṁ sāmikā rajakassa
atk-abh01a4:856_1: anupadajjeyyuṁ. Tamenaṁ rajako ūse vā khāre vā gomaye vā sammadditvā acche udake
atk-abh01a4:856_2: vikkhāleti. Kiñcāpi taṁ hoti vatthaṁ parisuddhaṁ pariyodātaṁ, atha khvassa hotiyeva
atk-abh01a4:856_3: ‘aṇusahagato ūsagandho vā khāragandho vā gomayagandho vā asamūhato’. Tamenaṁ rajako
atk-abh01a4:856_4: sāmikānaṁ deti. Tamenaṁ sāmikā gandhaparibhāvite karaṇḍake nikkhipanti. Yopissa hoti
atk-abh01a4:856_5: aṇusahagato ūsagandho vā khāragandho vā gomayagandho vā asamūhato, sopi samugghātaṁ
atk-abh01a4:856_6: gacchati. Evameva kho, āvuso, kiñcāpi ariyasāvakassa pañcorambhāgiyāni saṁyojanāni
atk-abh01a4:856_7: pahīnāni bhavanti, atha khvassa hotiyeva pañcasu upādānakkhandhesu aṇusahagato ‘asmī’ti
atk-abh01a4:856_8: māno, ‘asmī’ti chando, ‘asmī’ti anusayo asamūhato, so aparena samayena pañcasu upādānakkhandhesu
atk-abh01a4:856_9: udayabbayānupassī viharati – ‘iti rūpaṁ, iti rūpassa samudayo, iti rūpassa atthaṅgamo;
atk-abh01a4:856_10: iti vedanā iti saññā iti saṅkhārā iti viññāṇaṁ, iti viññāṇassa samudayo, iti viññāṇassa
atk-abh01a4:856_11: atthaṅgamo’ti. Tassimesu pañcasu upādānakkhandhesu udayabbayānupassino viharato yopissa
atk-abh01a4:856_12: hoti pañcasu upādānakkhandhesu aṇusahagato ‘asmī’ti māno, ‘asmī’ti chando, ‘asmī’ti
atk-abh01a4:856_13: anusayo asamūhato, sopi samugghātaṁ gacchatī’’ti (saṁ. ni. 3.89).
atk-abh01a4:857_0: Tattha sotāpattimaggena pañca akusalacittāni pahīyanti saddhiṁ cittaṅgavasena uppajjanakapāpadhammehi.
atk-abh01a4:857_1: Sakadāgāmimaggena dve domanassasahagatacittāni tanukāni bhavanti saddhiṁ cittaṅgavasena
atk-abh01a4:857_2: uppajjanakapāpadhammehi. Anāgāmimaggena tāniyeva pahīyanti saddhiṁ sampayuttadhammehi.
atk-abh01a4:857_3: Arahattamaggena pañca akusalacittāni pahīyanti saddhiṁ cittaṅgavasena uppajjanakapāpadhammehi.
atk-abh01a4:857_4: Imesaṁ dvādasannaṁ akusalacittānaṁ pahīnakālato paṭṭhāya khīṇāsavassa cittaṅgavasena
atk-abh01a4:858_0: Tatridaṁ opammaṁ – eko kira mahārājā paccante ārakkhaṁ datvā mahānagare issariyaṁ
atk-abh01a4:858_1: anubhavanto vasati. Athassa paccanto kuppi. Tasmiṁ samaye dvādasa corajeṭṭhakā anekehi
atk-abh01a4:858_2: purisasahassehi saddhiṁ raṭṭhaṁ vilumpanti. Paccantavāsino mahāmattā ‘paccanto kupito’ti
atk-abh01a4:858_3: rañño pahiṇiṁsu. Rājā ‘vissaṭṭhā gaṇhatha, ahaṁ tumhākaṁ kattabbaṁ karissāmī’ti sāsanaṁ
atk-abh01a4:858_4: pahiṇi . Te paṭhamasampahāreneva anekehi purisasahassehi saddhiṁ pañca corajeṭṭhake
atk-abh01a4:858_5: ghātayiṁsu. Sesā satta janā attano attano parivāre gahetvā pabbataṁ pavisiṁsu. Amaccā
atk-abh01a4:859_0: Rājā ‘tumhākaṁ kattabbayuttaṁ ahaṁ jānissāmi, tepi gaṇhathā’ti dhanaṁ pahiṇi. Te
atk-abh01a4:859_1: dutiyasampahārena dve corajeṭṭhake pahariṁsu, parivārepi tesaṁ dubbale akaṁsu. Te
atk-abh01a4:859_2: sabbepi palāyitvā pabbataṁ pavisiṁsu. Tampi pavattiṁ amaccā rañño pesayiṁsu.
atk-abh01a4:860: Puna rājā ‘vissaṭṭhā gaṇhantū’ti dhanaṁ pahiṇi. Te tatiyasampahārena saddhiṁ sahāyapurisehi dve corajeṭṭhake ghātayitvā taṁ pavattiṁ rañño pesayiṁsu.
atk-abh01a4:861_0: Puna rājā ‘avasese vissaṭṭhā gaṇhantū’ti dhanaṁ pahiṇi. Te catutthasampahārena saparivāre
atk-abh01a4:861_1: pañca corajeṭṭhake ghātayiṁsu. Dvādasannaṁ corajeṭṭhakānaṁ ghātitakālato paṭṭhāya
atk-abh01a4:861_2: koci coro nāma natthi. Khemā janapadā ure putte naccentā maññe viharanti. Rājā vijitasaṅgāmehi
atk-abh01a4:862_0: Tattha mahanto rājā viya dhammarājā. Paccantavāsino amaccā viya yogāvacarā kulaputtā.
atk-abh01a4:862_1: Dvādasa corajeṭṭhakā viya dvādasa akusalacittāni. Tesaṁ sahāyā anekasahassapurisā
atk-abh01a4:862_2: viya cittaṅgavasena uppajjanakapāpadhammā. Rañño paccanto kupitoti pahitakālo viya
atk-abh01a4:862_3: ārammaṇe kilesesu uppannesu ‘bhante, kileso me uppanno’ti satthu ārocanakālo. ‘Vissaṭṭhā
atk-abh01a4:862_4: gaṇhantū’ti dhanadānaṁ viya ‘kilese niggaṇha bhikkhū’ti dhammarañño kammaṭṭhānācikkhanaṁ.
atk-abh01a4:862_5: Saparivārānaṁ pañcannaṁ corajeṭṭhakānaṁ ghātitakālo viya sotāpattimaggena sampayuttānaṁ
atk-abh01a4:863_0: Puna rañño pavattipesanaṁ viya sammāsambuddhassa paṭiladdhaguṇārocanaṁ. ‘Sesake ca
atk-abh01a4:863_1: gaṇhantū’ti puna dhanadānaṁ viya bhagavato sakadāgāmimaggassa vipassanācikkhanaṁ.
atk-abh01a4:863_2: Dutiyasampahārena saparivārānaṁ dvinnaṁ corajeṭṭhakānaṁ dubbalīkaraṇaṁ viya sakadāgāmimaggena
atk-abh01a4:864_0: Puna rañño pavattipesanaṁ viya satthu paṭiladdhaguṇārocanaṁ. ‘Vissaṭṭhā gaṇhantū’ti
atk-abh01a4:864_1: puna dhanadānaṁ viya bhagavato anāgāmimaggassa vipassanācikkhanaṁ. Tatiyasampahārena
atk-abh01a4:864_2: saparivārānaṁ dvinnaṁ corajeṭṭhakānaṁ ghātanaṁ viya anāgāmimaggena sasampayuttānaṁ
atk-abh01a4:865_0: Puna rañño pavattipesanaṁ viya tathāgatassa paṭiladdhaguṇārocanaṁ. ‘Vissaṭṭhā gaṇhantū’ti
atk-abh01a4:865_1: puna dhanadānaṁ viya bhagavato arahattamaggassa vipassanācikkhanaṁ. Catutthasampahārena
atk-abh01a4:865_2: saparivārānaṁ pañcannaṁ corajeṭṭhakānaṁ ghātitakālato paṭṭhāya janapadassa khemakālo
atk-abh01a4:865_3: viya arahattamaggena sasampayuttesu pañcasu akusalacittesu pahīnesu dvādasannaṁ akusalacittānaṁ
atk-abh01a4:865_4: pahīnakālato paṭṭhāya puna cittaṅgavasena uppajjanakassa akusaladhammassa abhāvo.
atk-abh01a4:865_5: Rañño vijitasaṅgāmassa amaccagaṇaparivutassa varapāsāde mahāsampattianubhavanaṁ viya
atk-abh01a4:870_0: 365. Idāni akusaladhammapadaṁ bhājetvā dassetuṁ katame dhammā akusalātiādi āraddhaṁ.
atk-abh01a4:870_1: Tattha dhammavavatthānādivārappabhedo ca heṭṭhā āgatānaṁ padānaṁ atthavinicchayo
atk-abh01a4:870_2: ca heṭṭhā vuttanayeneva veditabbo. Tattha tattha pana visesamattameva vaṇṇayissāma.
atk-abh01a4:870_3: Tattha samayavavatthāne tāva yasmā, kusalassa viya, akusalassa bhūmibhedo natthi,
atk-abh01a4:870_4: tasmā ekantaṁ kāmāvacarampi samānaṁ etaṁ ‘kāmāvacara’nti na vuttaṁ. Diṭṭhigatasampayuttanti
atk-abh01a4:870_5: ettha diṭṭhi eva diṭṭhigataṁ ‘gūthagataṁ muttagata’ntiādīni (a. ni. 9.11) viya. Gantabbābhāvato
atk-abh01a4:870_6: vā diṭṭhiyā gatamattamevetantipi diṭṭhigataṁ. Tena sampayuttaṁ diṭṭhigatasampayuttaṁ.
atk-abh01a4:871_0: Tattha asaddhammasavanaṁ, akalyāṇamittatā, ariyānaṁ adassanakāmatādīni ayoniso manasikāroti
atk-abh01a4:871_1: evamādīhi kāraṇehi imassa diṭṭhigatasaṅkhātassa micchādassanassa uppatti veditabbā.
atk-abh01a4:871_2: Ye hi ete diṭṭhivādapaṭisaṁyuttā asaddhammā tesaṁ bahumānapubbaṅgamena atikkantamajjhattena
atk-abh01a4:871_3: upaparikkhārahitena savanena, ye ca diṭṭhivipannā akalyāṇamittā taṁsampavaṅkatāsaṅkhātāya
atk-abh01a4:871_4: akalyāṇamittatāya, buddhādīnaṁ ariyānañceva sappurisānañca adassanakāmatāya catusatipaṭṭhānādibhede
atk-abh01a4:871_6: ariyadhamme ceva sappurisadhamme ca saṁvarabhedasaṅkhātena avinayena teheva kāraṇehi
atk-abh01a4:871_7: paribhāvitena ayoniso manasikārena kotūhalamaṅgalādipasutatāya ca etaṁ uppajjatīti
atk-abh01a4:871_8: veditabbaṁ. Asaṅkhārabhāvo panassa cittassa heṭṭhā vuttanayeneva veditabbo.
atk-abh01a4:872: Dhammuddesavāre phassoti akusalacittasahajāto phasso. Vedanādīsupi eseva nayo. Iti akusalamattameva etesaṁ purimehi viseso.
atk-abh01a4:873_0: Cittassekaggatā hotīti pāṇātipātādīsupi avikkhittabhāvena cittassa ekaggatā hoti.
atk-abh01a4:873_1: Manussā hi cittaṁ samādahitvā avikkhittā hutvā avirajjhamānāni satthāni pāṇasarīresu
atk-abh01a4:873_2: nipātenti, susamāhitā paresaṁ santakaṁ haranti, ekarasena cittena micchācāraṁ āpajjanti.
atk-abh01a4:874_0: Micchādiṭṭhīti ayāthāvadiṭṭhi, virajjhitvā gahaṇato vā vitathā diṭṭhi micchādiṭṭhi.
atk-abh01a4:874_1: Anatthāvahattā paṇḍitehi jigucchitā diṭṭhītipi micchādiṭṭhi. Micchāsaṅkappādīsupi
atk-abh01a4:874_2: eseva nayo. Apica micchā passanti tāya, sayaṁ vā micchā passati, micchādassanamattameva
atk-abh01a4:874_3: vā esāti micchādiṭṭhi. Sā ayoniso abhinivesalakkhaṇā, parāmāsarasā, micchābhinivesapaccupaṭṭhānā,
atk-abh01a4:874_4: ariyānaṁ adassanakāmatādipadaṭṭhānā; paramaṁ vajjanti daṭṭhabbā. Micchāsaṅkappādīsu
atk-abh01a4:874_5: ‘micchā’ti padamattameva viseso. Sesaṁ kusalādhikāre vuttanayeneva veditabbaṁ.
atk-abh01a4:875_0: Ahirikabalaṁanottappabalanti ettha balattho niddesavāre āvi bhavissati. Itaresu pana
atk-abh01a4:875_1: – na hiriyatīti ahiriko. Ahirikassa bhāvo ahirikaṁ. Na ottappaṁ anottappaṁ. Tesu
atk-abh01a4:875_2: ahirikaṁ kāyaduccaritādīhi ajigucchanalakkhaṇaṁ, alajjālakkhaṇaṁ vā. Anottappaṁ teheva
atk-abh01a4:875_3: asārajjanalakkhaṇaṁ anuttāsanalakkhaṇaṁ vā. Ahirikameva balaṁ ahirikabalaṁ. Anottappameva
atk-abh01a4:875_4: balaṁ anottappabalaṁ. Ayamettha saṅkhepattho. Vitthāro pana heṭṭhā vuttapaṭipakkhavasena veditabbo.
atk-abh01a4:876_0: Lubbhanti tena, sayaṁ vā lubbhati, lubbhanamattameva vā tanti lobho. Muyhanti tena,
atk-abh01a4:876_1: sayaṁ vā muyhati, muyhanamattameva vā tanti moho. Tesu lobho ārammaṇaggahaṇalakkhaṇo
atk-abh01a4:876_2: makkaṭālepo viya, abhisaṅgaraso tattakapāle khittamaṁsapesi viya, apariccāgapaccupaṭṭhāno
atk-abh01a4:876_3: telañjanarāgo viya, saṁyojaniyadhammesu assādadassanapadaṭṭhāno. So taṇhānadībhāvena
atk-abh01a4:876_4: vaḍḍhamāno, sīghasotā nadī viya mahāsamuddaṁ, apāyameva gahetvā gacchatīti daṭṭhabbo.
atk-abh01a4:877_0: Moho cittassa andhabhāvalakkhaṇo aññāṇalakkhaṇo vā, asampaṭivedharaso ārammaṇasabhāvacchādanaraso
atk-abh01a4:878_0: Abhijjhāyanti tāya, sayaṁ vā abhijjhāyati, abhijjhāyanamattameva vā esāti abhijjhā.
atk-abh01a4:878_1: Sā parasampattīnaṁ sakakaraṇaicchālakkhaṇā, tenākārena esanabhāvarasā, parasampatti-abhimukhabhāvapaccupaṭṭhānā,
atk-abh01a4:878_2: parasampattīsu abhiratipadaṭṭhānā. Parasampattiabhimukhā eva hi sā upaṭṭhahati. Tāsu
atk-abh01a4:878_3: ca abhiratiyā sati pavattati, parasampattīsu cetaso hatthappasāroviyāti daṭṭhabbā.
atk-abh01a4:879: Samatho hotītiādīsu aññesu kiccesu vikkhepasamanato samatho. Akusalappavattiyaṁ cittaṁ paggaṇhātīti paggāho. Na vikkhipatīti avikkhepo.
atk-abh01a4:880_0: Imasmiṁ citte saddhā, sati, paññā, cha yugaḷakānīti ime dhammā na gahitā. Kasmā?
atk-abh01a4:880_1: Assaddhiyacitte pasādo nāma natthi. Tasmā tāva saddhā na gahitā. Kiṁ pana diṭṭhigatikā
atk-abh01a4:880_2: attano attano satthārānaṁ na saddahantīti? Saddahanti. Sā pana saddhā nāma na hoti,
atk-abh01a4:880_3: vacanasampaṭicchanamattamevetaṁ. Atthato anupaparikkhā vā hoti, diṭṭhi vā. Asatiyacitte
atk-abh01a4:880_4: pana sati natthīti na gahitā. Kiṁ diṭṭhigatikā attanā katakammaṁ na sarantīti? Saranti.
atk-abh01a4:880_5: Sā pana sati nāma na hoti. Kevalaṁ tenākārena akusalacittappavatti. Tasmā sati na
atk-abh01a4:880_6: gahitā. Atha kasmā ‘‘micchāsatī’’ti (dī. ni. 3.333; saṁ. ni. 5.1) suttante vuttā?
atk-abh01a4:880_7: Sā pana akusalakkhandhānaṁ sativirahitattā satipaṭipakkhattā ca micchāmaggamicchattānaṁ
atk-abh01a4:880_8: pūraṇatthaṁ tattha pariyāyena desanā katā. Nippariyāyena panesā natthi. Tasmā na
atk-abh01a4:880_9: gahitā. Andhabālacitte pana paññā natthīti na gahitā. Kiṁ diṭṭhigatikānaṁ vañcanāpaññā
atk-abh01a4:880_10: natthīti? Atthi. Na panesā paññā, māyā nāmesā hoti. Sā atthato taṇhāva. Idaṁ pana
atk-abh01a4:880_11: cittaṁ sadarathaṁ garukaṁ bhāriyaṁ kakkhaḷaṁ thaddhaṁ akammaññaṁ gilānaṁ vaṅkaṁ kuṭilaṁ.
atk-abh01a4:880_12: Tasmā passaddhādīni cha yugaḷakāni na gahitāni.
atk-abh01a4:881_0: Ettāvatā padapaṭipāṭiyā cittaṅgavasena pāḷiāruḷhāni dvattiṁsa padāni dassetvā idāni
atk-abh01a4:881_1: yevāpanakadhamme dassetuṁ ye vā pana tasmiṁ samayetiādimāha. Tattha sabbesupi akusalacittesu
atk-abh01a4:881_2: chando adhimokkho manasikāro māno issā macchariyaṁ thinaṁ middhaṁ uddhaccaṁ kukkuccanti
atk-abh01a4:881_3: ime daseva yevāpanakā honti dhammā, suttāgatā, suttapadesu dissareti vuttā. Imasmiṁ
atk-abh01a4:881_4: pana citte chando adhimokkho manasikāro uddhaccanti ime apaṇṇakaṅgasaṅkhātā cattārova yevāpanakā honti.
atk-abh01a4:882_0: Tattha chandādayo heṭṭhā vuttanayeneva veditabbā. Kevalañhi te kusalā, ime akusalā.
atk-abh01a4:882_1: Itaraṁ pana uddhatassa bhāvo ‘uddhaccaṁ’. Taṁ cetaso avūpasamalakkhaṇaṁ vātābhighātacalajalaṁ
atk-abh01a4:883_0: Iti phassādīni dvattiṁsa, yevāpanakavasena vuttāni cattārīti sabbānipi imasmiṁ dhammuddesavāre
atk-abh01a4:883_1: chattiṁsa dhammapadāni bhavanti. Cattāri apaṇṇakaṅgāni hāpetvā pāḷiyaṁ āgatāni dvattiṁsameva.
atk-abh01a4:883_2: Aggahitaggahaṇena panettha phassapañcakaṁ, vitakko vicāro pīti cittassekaggatā vīriyindriyaṁ
atk-abh01a4:883_3: jīvitindriyaṁ micchādiṭṭhi ahirikaṁ anottappaṁ lobho mohoti soḷasa dhammā honti.
atk-abh01a4:884_0: Tesu soḷasasu satta dhammā avibhattikā nava savibhattikā honti. Katame satta? Phasso
atk-abh01a4:884_1: saññā cetanā vicāro pīti jīvitindriyaṁ mohoti ime satta avibhattikā. Vedanā cittaṁ
atk-abh01a4:884_2: vitakko cittassekaggatā vīriyindriyaṁ micchādiṭṭhi ahirikaṁ anottappaṁ lobhoti ime nava savibhattikā.
atk-abh01a4:885_0: Tesu cha dhammā dvīsu ṭhānesu vibhattā, eko tīsu, eko catūsu, eko chasu. Kathaṁ?
atk-abh01a4:885_1: Cittaṁ vitakko micchādiṭṭhi ahirikaṁ anottappaṁ lobhoti ime cha dvīsu ṭhānesu vibhattā.
atk-abh01a4:885_2: Tesu hi cittaṁ tāva phassapañcakaṁ patvā cittaṁ hotīti vuttaṁ, indriyāni patvā manindriyanti.
atk-abh01a4:885_3: Vitakko jhānaṅgāni patvā vitakko hotīti vutto, maggaṅgāni patvā micchāsaṅkappoti.
atk-abh01a4:885_4: Micchādiṭṭhi maggaṅgesupi kammapathesupi micchādiṭṭhiyeva. Ahirikaṁ balāni patvā
atk-abh01a4:885_5: ahirikabalaṁ hotīti vuttaṁ, lokanāsakadukaṁ patvā ahirikanti. Anottappepi eseva nayo.
atk-abh01a4:885_6: Lobho mūlaṁ patvā lobho hotīti vutto. Kammapathaṁ patvā abhijjhāti. Ime cha dvīsu ṭhānesu vibhattā.
atk-abh01a4:886: Vedanā pana phassapañcakaṁ patvā vedanā hotīti vuttā, jhānaṅgāni patvā sukhanti, indriyāni patvā somanassindriyanti. Evaṁ ekova dhammo tīsu ṭhānesu vibhatto.
atk-abh01a4:887_0: Vīriyaṁ pana indriyāni patvā vīriyindriyaṁ hotīti vuttaṁ, maggaṅgāni patvā micchāvāyāmo
atk-abh01a4:887_1: hotīti, balāni patvā vīriyabalanti, piṭṭhidukaṁ patvā paggāho hotīti. Evaṁ ayaṁ eko
atk-abh01a4:888_0: Samādhi pana jhānaṅgāni patvā cittassekaggatā hotīti vutto, indriyāni patvā samādhindriyanti,
atk-abh01a4:888_1: maggaṅgāni patvā micchāsamādhīti, balāni patvā samādhibalanti, piṭṭhidukaṁ patvā
atk-abh01a4:888_2: dutiyaduke ekakavaseneva samathoti , tatiye avikkhepoti. Evamayaṁ eko dhammo chasu ṭhānesu vibhatto.
atk-abh01a4:889_0: Sabbepi panete dhammā phassapañcakavasena jhānaṅgavasena indriyavasena maggaṅgavasena
atk-abh01a4:889_1: balavasena mūlavasena kammapathavasena lokanāsakavasena piṭṭhidukavasenāti nava rāsayo
atk-abh01a4:889_2: honti. Tattha yaṁ vattabbaṁ taṁ paṭhamakusalacittaniddese vuttamevāti.
atk-abh01a4:892_0: 375. Niddesavāre cittassekaggatāniddese tāva saṇṭhiti avaṭṭhitīti. Idaṁ dvayaṁ ṭhitivevacanameva.
atk-abh01a4:892_1: Yaṁ pana kusalaniddese ‘ārammaṇaṁ ogāhetvā anupavisitvā tiṭṭhatīti avaṭṭhitī’ti vuttaṁ,
atk-abh01a4:892_2: taṁ idha na labbhati. Akusalasmiñhi dubbalā cittassekaggatāti heṭṭhā dīpitameva.
atk-abh01a4:893_0: 384. Uddhaccavicikicchāvasena pavattassa visāhārassa paṭipakkhato avisāhāroti evarūpopi
atk-abh01a4:893_1: attho idha na labbhati. Sahajātadhamme pana na visāharatīti avisāhāro. Na vikkhipatīti
atk-abh01a4:893_2: avikkhepo. Akusalacittekaggatāvasena avisāhaṭassa mānasassa bhāvo avisāhaṭamānasatā.
atk-abh01a4:893_3: Sahajātadhammesu na kampatīti samādhibalaṁ. Ayāthāvasamādhānato micchāsamādhīti evamidha attho daṭṭhabbo.
atk-abh01a4:894: 385. Vīriyindriyaniddese yo heṭṭhā ‘nikkamo ceso kāmānaṁ panudanāyā’tiādi nayo vutto, so idha na labbhati. Sahajātadhammesu akampanaṭṭheneva vīriyabalaṁ veditabbaṁ.
atk-abh01a4:895_0: 386. Micchādiṭṭhiniddese ayāthāvadassanaṭṭhena micchādiṭṭhi. Diṭṭhīsu gataṁ idaṁ
atk-abh01a4:895_1: dassanaṁ, dvāsaṭṭhidiṭṭhiantogatattāti diṭṭhigataṁ. Heṭṭhāpissa attho vuttoyeva.
atk-abh01a4:895_4: viya. Sammādiṭṭhiyā vinivijjhanaṭṭhena vilomanaṭṭhena ca diṭṭhivisūkāyikaṁ. Micchādassanañhi
atk-abh01a4:895_5: uppajjamānaṁ sammādassanaṁ vinivijjhati ceva vilometi ca. Kadāci sassatassa kadāci
atk-abh01a4:895_6: ucchedassa gahaṇato diṭṭhiyā virūpaṁ phanditanti diṭṭhivipphanditaṁ. Diṭṭhigatiko
atk-abh01a4:895_7: hi ekasmiṁ patiṭṭhātuṁ na sakkoti, kadāci sassataṁ anupatati kadāci ucchedaṁ. Diṭṭhiyeva
atk-abh01a4:896_0: Susumārādayo viya purisaṁ, ārammaṇaṁ daḷhaṁ gaṇhātīti gāho. Patiṭṭhahanato patiṭṭhāho.
atk-abh01a4:896_1: Ayañhi balavappavattibhāvena patiṭṭhahitvā gaṇhāti. Niccādivasena abhinivisatīti
atk-abh01a4:896_2: abhiniveso. Dhammasabhāvaṁ atikkamitvā niccādivasena parato āmasatīti parāmāso. Anatthāvahattā
atk-abh01a4:896_3: kucchito maggo, kucchitānaṁ vā apāyānaṁ maggoti kummaggo. Ayāthāvapathato micchāpatho.
atk-abh01a4:896_4: Yathā hi disāmūḷhena ayaṁ asukagāmassa nāma pathoti gahitopi taṁ gāmaṁ na sampāpeti,
atk-abh01a4:896_5: evaṁ diṭṭhigatikena sugatipathoti gahitāpi diṭṭhi sugatiṁ na pāpetīti ayāthāvapathato,
atk-abh01a4:896_6: micchāpatho. Micchāsabhāvato micchattaṁ. Tattheva paribbhamanato taranti ettha bālāti
atk-abh01a4:896_7: titthaṁ. Titthañca taṁ anatthānañca āyatananti titthāyatanaṁ. Titthiyānaṁ vā sañjātidesaṭṭhena
atk-abh01a4:896_8: nivāsaṭhānaṭṭhena ca āyatanantipi titthāyatanaṁ. Vipariyesabhūto gāho, vipariyesato
atk-abh01a4:896_9: vā gāhoti vipariyesaggāho; vipallattha gāhoti attho.
atk-abh01a4:897: 387-388. Ahirikānottappaniddesesu hirottappaniddesavipariyāyena attho veditabbo. Sahajātadhammesu pana akampanaṭṭheneva ahirikabalaṁ anottappabalañca veditabbaṁ.
atk-abh01a4:898_0: 389. Lobhamohaniddesesu lubbhatīti lobho. Lubbhanāti lubbhanākāro. Lobhasampayuttacittaṁ,
atk-abh01a4:898_1: puggalo vā lubbhito; lubbhitassa bhāvo lubbhitattaṁ. Sārajjatīti sārāgo. Sārajjanākāro
atk-abh01a4:898_2: sārajjanā. Sārajjitassa bhāvo sārajjitattaṁ. Abhijjhāyanaṭṭhena abhijjhā. Puna ‘lobha’-vacane
atk-abh01a4:898_3: kāraṇaṁ vuttameva. Akusalañca taṁ mūlañca akusalānaṁ vā mūlanti akusalamūlaṁ.
atk-abh01a4:899_0: 390. Ñāṇadassanapaṭipakkhato aññāṇaṁ adassanaṁ. Abhimukho hutvā dhammena na sameti,
atk-abh01a4:899_1: na samāgacchatīti anabhisamayo. Anurūpato dhamme bujjhatīti anubodho. Tappaṭipakkhatāya
atk-abh01a4:899_2: ananubodho. Aniccādīhi saddhiṁ yojetvā na bujjhatīti asambodho. Asantaṁ asamañca
atk-abh01a4:899_3: bujjhatītipi asambodho. Catusaccadhammaṁ nappaṭivijjhatīti appaṭivedho. Rūpādīsu
atk-abh01a4:899_4: ekadhammampi aniccādisāmaññato na saṅgaṇhātīti asaṁgāhanā. Tameva dhammaṁ na pariyogāhatīti
atk-abh01a4:899_5: apariyogāhanā. Na samaṁ pekkhatīti asamapekkhaṇā. Dhammānaṁ sabhāvaṁ pati na apekkhatīti apaccavekkhaṇā.
atk-abh01a4:900_0: Kusalākusalakammesu viparītavuttiyā sabhāvaggahaṇābhāvena vā ekampi kammaṁ etassa
atk-abh01a4:900_1: paccakkhaṁ natthi, sayaṁ vā kassaci kammassa paccakkhakaraṇaṁ nāma na hotīti appaccakkhakammaṁ.
atk-abh01a4:900_2: Yaṁ etasmiṁ anuppajjamāne cittasantānaṁ mejjhaṁ bhaveyya, suci, vodānaṁ, taṁ duṭṭhaṁ
atk-abh01a4:900_3: mejjhaṁ imināti dummejjhaṁ. Bālānaṁ bhāvoti bālyaṁ. Muyhatīti moho. Balavataro moho
atk-abh01a4:900_4: pamoho. Samantato muyhatīti sammoho. Vijjāya paṭipakkhabhāvato na vijjāti avijjā.
atk-abh01a4:900_5: Oghayogattho vuttoyeva. Thāmagataṭṭhena anusetīti anusayo. Cittaṁ pariyuṭṭhāti, abhibhavatīti
atk-abh01a4:900_6: pariyuṭṭhānaṁ. Hitaggahaṇābhāvena hitābhimukhaṁ gantuṁ na sakkoti, aññadatthu laṅgatiyevāti
atk-abh01a4:900_7: laṅgī; khañjatīti attho. Durugghāṭanaṭṭhena vā laṅgī. Yathā hi mahāpalighasaṅkhātā
atk-abh01a4:900_8: laṅgī durugghāṭā hoti, evamayampi laṅgī viyāti laṅgī. Sesaṁ uttānatthameva. Saṅgahavārasuññatavārāpi
atk-abh01a4:902_0: 399. Dutiyacitte sasaṅkhārenāti padaṁ visesaṁ. Tampi heṭṭhā vuttatthameva. Idaṁ pana
atk-abh01a4:902_1: cittaṁ kiñcāpi chasu ārammaṇesu somanassitassa lobhaṁ uppādetvā ‘satto satto’tiādinā
atk-abh01a4:902_2: nayena parāmasantassa uppajjati, tathāpi sasaṅkhārikattā sappayogena saupāyena uppajjanato
atk-abh01a4:902_3: – yadā kulaputto micchādiṭṭhikassa kulassa kumārikaṁ pattheti. Te ca ‘aññadiṭṭhikā
atk-abh01a4:902_4: tumhe’ti kumārikaṁ na denti. Athaññe ñātakā ‘yaṁ tumhe karotha tamevāyaṁ karissatī’ti
atk-abh01a4:902_5: dāpenti. So tehi saddhiṁ titthiye upasaṅkamati. Āditova vematiko hoti. Gacchante
atk-abh01a4:902_6: gacchante kāle etesaṁ kiriyā manāpāti laddhiṁ roceti, diṭṭhiṁ gaṇhāti – evarūpe kāle
atk-abh01a4:903_0: Yevāpanakesu panettha thinamiddhaṁ adhikaṁ. Tattha thinanatā ‘thinaṁ’. Middhanatā
atk-abh01a4:903_1: ‘middhaṁ’; anussāhasaṁhananatā asattivighāto cāti attho. Thinañca middhañca thinamiddhaṁ.
atk-abh01a4:903_2: Tattha thinaṁ anussāhalakkhaṇaṁ, vīriyavinodanarasaṁ, saṁsīdanapaccupaṭṭhānaṁ. Middhaṁ
atk-abh01a4:905_0: 400. Tatiyaṁ chasu ārammaṇesu somanassitassa lobhaṁ uppādetvā ‘satto satto’tiādinā
atk-abh01a4:905_2: vā uppajjati. Idha mānena saddhiṁ pañca apaṇṇakaṅgāni honti. Tattha maññatīti ‘māno’.
atk-abh01a4:907_0: 402. Catutthaṁ vuttappakāresu eva ṭhānesu yadā sīse kheḷaṁ khipanti, pādapaṁsuṁ okiranti,
atk-abh01a4:907_1: tadā tassa pariharaṇatthaṁ saussāhena antarantarā olokentānaṁ rājanāṭakesu nikkhantesu
atk-abh01a4:907_2: ussāraṇāya vattamānāya tena tena chiddena olokentānañcāti evamādīsu ṭhānesu uppajjati.
atk-abh01a4:907_3: Idha pana thinamiddhehi saddhiṁ satta yevāpanakā honti. Ubhayatthāpi micchādiṭṭhi
atk-abh01a4:907_4: parihāyati. Taṁ ṭhapetvā sesānaṁ vasena dhammagaṇanā veditabbāti.
atk-abh01a4:909_0: 403. Pañcamaṁ chasu ārammaṇesu vedanāvasena majjhattassa lobhaṁ uppādetvā ‘satto
atk-abh01a4:909_1: satto’tiādinā nayena parāmasantassa uppajjati. Somanassaṭṭhāne panettha upekkhāvedanā
atk-abh01a4:909_2: hoti, pītipadaṁ parihāyati. Sesaṁ sabbaṁ paṭhamacittasadisameva.
atk-abh01a4:911_0: 409-412. Chaṭṭhasattamaṭṭhamānipi vedanaṁ parivattetvā pītipadañca hāpetvā dutiyatatiyacatutthesu
atk-abh01a4:911_1: vuttanayeneva veditabbāni. Imesu aṭṭhasu lobhasahagatacittesu sahajātādhipati ārammaṇādhipatīti
atk-abh01a4:913_0: 413. Navamaṁ chasu ārammaṇesu domanassitassa paṭighaṁ uppādayato uppajjati. Tassa
atk-abh01a4:913_1: samayavavatthānavāre tāva duṭṭhu mano, hīnavedanattā vā kucchitaṁ manoti dummano;
atk-abh01a4:913_2: dummanassa bhāvo domanassaṁ. Tena sahagatanti domanassasahagataṁ. Asampiyāyanabhāvena
atk-abh01a4:913_3: ārammaṇasmiṁ paṭihaññatīti paṭighaṁ. Tena sampayuttanti paṭighasampayuttaṁ.
atk-abh01a4:914_0: Dhammuddese tīsupi ṭhānesu domanassavedanāva āgatā. Tattha vedanāpadaṁ vuttameva.
atk-abh01a4:914_1: Tathā dukkhadomanassapadāni lakkhaṇādito pana aniṭṭhārammaṇānubhavanalakkhaṇaṁ domanassaṁ,
atk-abh01a4:914_2: yathātathā vā aniṭṭhākārasambhogarasaṁ, cetasikābādhapaccupaṭṭhānaṁ, ekanteneva hadayavatthupadaṭṭhānaṁ.
atk-abh01a4:915_0: Mūlakammapathesu yathā purimacittesu lobho hoti, abhijjhā hotīti āgataṁ, evaṁ doso
atk-abh01a4:915_1: hoti, byāpādo hotīti vuttaṁ. Tattha dussanti tena, sayaṁ vā dussati, dussanamattameva
atk-abh01a4:915_2: vā tanti doso so caṇḍikkalakkhaṇo pahaṭāsiviso viya, visappanaraso visanipāto viya,
atk-abh01a4:915_3: attano nissayadahanaraso vā dāvaggi viya, dussanapaccupaṭṭhāno laddhokāso viya sapatto,
atk-abh01a4:916_0: Byāpajjati tena cittaṁ, pūtibhāvaṁ upagacchati, byāpādayati vā vinayācārarūpasampattihitasukhādīnīti
atk-abh01a4:916_1: byāpādo. Atthato panesa dosoyeva. Idha padapaṭipāṭiyā ekūnatiṁsa padāni honti. Aggahitaggahaṇena
atk-abh01a4:917_1: pana aññatarena saddhiṁ pañca pañca hutvāpi uppajjanti. Evamepi tayo dhammā aniyatayevāpanakā
atk-abh01a4:917_2: nāma. Tesu issatīti ‘issā’. Sā parasampattīnaṁ usūyanalakkhaṇā, tattheva anabhiratirasā,
atk-abh01a4:917_3: tato vimukhabhāvapaccupaṭṭhānā, parasampattipadaṭṭhānā. Saṁyojananti daṭṭhabbā. Maccherabhāvo
atk-abh01a4:917_4: ‘macchariyaṁ’. Taṁ laddhānaṁ vā labhitabbānaṁ vā attano sampattīnaṁ nigūhanalakkhaṇaṁ,
atk-abh01a4:917_6: vā, attasampattipadaṭṭhānaṁ. Cetaso virūpabhāvoti daṭṭhabbaṁ. Kucchitaṁ kataṁ kukataṁ.
atk-abh01a4:917_7: Tassa bhāvo ‘kukkuccaṁ’. Taṁ pacchānutāpalakkhaṇaṁ, katākatānusocanarasaṁ, vippaṭisārapaccupaṭṭhānaṁ,
atk-abh01a4:917_8: katākatapadaṭṭhānaṁ. Dāsabyaṁ viya daṭṭhabbaṁ. Ayaṁ tāva uddesavāre viseso.
atk-abh01a4:919_0: 418. Dosaniddese dussatīti doso. Dussanāti dussanākāro. Dussitattanti dussitabhāvo.
atk-abh01a4:919_1: Pakatibhāvavijahanaṭṭhena byāpajjanaṁ byāpatti. Byāpajjanāti byāpajjanākāro. Virujjhatīti
atk-abh01a4:919_3: vā idaṁ vuttaṁ. Caṇḍiko vuccati caṇḍo, thaddhapuggalo; tassa bhāvo caṇḍikkaṁ. Na
atk-abh01a4:919_4: etena suropitaṁ vacanaṁ hoti, duruttaṁ aparipuṇṇameva hotīti asuropo. Kuddhakāle
atk-abh01a4:919_5: hi paripuṇṇavacanaṁ nāma natthi. Sacepi kassaci hoti taṁ appamāṇaṁ. Apare pana assujananaṭṭhena
atk-abh01a4:919_6: assuropanato assuropoti vadanti. Taṁ akāraṇaṁ, somanassassāpi assujananato. Heṭṭhā
atk-abh01a4:919_7: vuttaattamanatāpaṭipakkhato na attamanatāti anattamanatā. Sā pana yasmā cittasseva,
atk-abh01a4:919_8: na sattassa, tasmā cittassāti vuttaṁ. Sesamettha saṅgahasuññatavāresu ca heṭṭhā vuttanayeneva veditabbanti.
atk-abh01a4:921: 421. Dasamaṁ sasaṅkhārattā parehi ussāhitassa vā, paresaṁ vā aparādhaṁ sāritassa, sayameva vā paresaṁ aparādhaṁ anussaritvā kujjhamānassa uppajjati.
atk-abh01a4:922_0: Idhāpi padapaṭipāṭiyā ekūnatiṁsa, aggahitaggahaṇena ca cuddaseva padāni honti. Yevāpanakesu
atk-abh01a4:922_1: pana thinamiddhampi labbhati. Tasmā ettha vinā issāmacchariyakukkuccehi cattāri apaṇṇakaṅgāni
atk-abh01a4:922_2: thinamiddhanti ime cha issādīnaṁ uppattikāle tesu aññatarena saddhiṁ satta yevāpanakā
atk-abh01a4:922_3: ekakkhaṇe uppajjanti. Sesaṁ sabbaṁ sabbavāresu navamasadisameva. Imesu pana dvīsu
atk-abh01a4:922_4: domanassacittesu sahajātādhipatiyeva labbhati, na ārammaṇādhipati. Na hi kuddho kiñci garuṁ karotīti.
atk-abh01a4:924_0: 422. Ekādasamaṁ chasu ārammaṇesu vedanāvasena majjhattassa kaṅkhāpavattikāle uppajjati.
atk-abh01a4:924_1: Tassa samayavavatthāne vicikicchāsampayuttanti padaṁ apubbaṁ. Tassattho – vicikicchāya
atk-abh01a4:924_2: sampayuttanti vicikicchāsampayuttaṁ. Dhammuddese ‘vicikicchā hotī’ti padameva viseso.
atk-abh01a4:924_3: Tattha vigatā cikicchāti vicikicchā. Sabhāvaṁ vā vicinanto etāya kicchati kilamatīti
atk-abh01a4:924_4: vicikicchā. Sā saṁsayalakkhaṇā, kampanarasā, anicchayapaccupaṭṭhānā anekaṁsagāhapaccupaṭṭhānā
atk-abh01a4:925: Idha padapaṭipāṭiyā tevīsati padāni honti. Aggahitaggahaṇena cuddasa. Tesaṁ vasena savibhattikāvibhattikarāsivinicchayo veditabbo. Manasikāro uddhaccanti dveyeva yevāpanakā.
atk-abh01a4:926_0: 424. Niddesavārassa cittassekaggatāniddese yasmā idaṁ dubbalaṁ cittaṁ pavattiṭṭhitimattakamevettha
atk-abh01a4:926_1: hoti, tasmā ‘saṇṭhitī’tiādīni avatvā cittassa ‘ṭhitī’ti ekameva padaṁ vuttaṁ. Teneva
atk-abh01a4:927_0: 425. Vicikicchāniddese kaṅkhanavasena kaṅkhā. Kaṅkhāya āyanāti kaṅkhāyanā. Purimakaṅkhā
atk-abh01a4:927_1: hi uttarakaṅkhaṁ āneti nāma. Ākāravasena vā etaṁ vuttaṁ. Kaṅkhāsamaṅgicittaṁ kaṅkhāya
atk-abh01a4:927_2: āyitattā kaṅkhāyitaṁ nāma. Tassa bhāvo kaṅkhāyitattaṁ. Vimatīti namati. Vicikicchā
atk-abh01a4:927_3: vuttatthā eva. Kampanaṭṭhena dvidhā eḷayatīti dveḷhakaṁ. Paṭipattinivāraṇena dvidhāpatho
atk-abh01a4:927_4: viyāti dvedhāpatho. ‘Niccaṁ nu kho idaṁ, aniccaṁ nu kho’tiādipavattiyā ekasmiṁ ākāre
atk-abh01a4:927_5: saṇṭhātuṁ asamatthatāya samantato setīti saṁsayo. Ekaṁsaṁ gahetuṁ asamatthatāya na
atk-abh01a4:927_6: ekaṁsaggāhoti anekaṁsaggāho. Nicchetuṁ asakkontī ārammaṇato osakkatīti āsappanā.
atk-abh01a4:927_7: Ogāhituṁ asakkontī parisamantato sappatīti parisappanā. Pariyogāhituṁ asamatthatāya
atk-abh01a4:927_8: apariyogāhanā. Nicchayavasena ārammaṇe pavattituṁ asamatthatāya thambhitattaṁ; cittassa
atk-abh01a4:927_9: thaddhabhāvoti attho. Vicikicchā hi uppajjitvā cittaṁ thaddhaṁ karoti. Yasmā panesā
atk-abh01a4:927_10: uppajjamānā ārammaṇaṁ gahetvā manaṁ vilikhantī viya, tasmā manovilekhoti vuttā. Sesaṁ
atk-abh01a4:929_1: Idañhi cittaṁ chasu ārammaṇesu vedanāvasena majjhattaṁ hutvā uddhataṁ hoti. Idha
atk-abh01a4:929_3: padāni honti. Aggahitaggahaṇena cuddasa. Tesaṁ vasena savibhattikāvibhattikarāsividhānaṁ
atk-abh01a4:930_0: 429. Niddesavārassa uddhaccaniddese cittassāti na sattassa, na posassa. Uddhaccanti
